summary: Waking up from stasis alone with no memories years ago Em has made peace with living a calm quiet life in her bunker, until one day while watching the cameras she spots a woman who needs help. Letting her into her life and bunker Em changes both of their lives forever...

name: Raiden III x Mikado Maniax
summary: This is an enhanced version of the original Raiden III, which came out in 2005 for arcades and consoles. There will be some new game modes, online features, and customization options.

name: Rainbow Impostor Survivor 3D
summary: In Rainbow Impostor Survivor 3D, you will play as an impostor who has been kidnapped during a school trip to an amusement park called Spooky park. From the moment of your capture, the impostor must survive five nights in the strange location that’s entirely empty of life except for you and the Rainbow Monster.

name: Raguna and the Crystal of Miracles
summary: Raguna and The Crystal of Miracles is a RPG Maker horror/comedy game featuring 2+ hours of content, several endings, and many ways to die.

name: Rainbow Dawn
summary: One day, you find yourself trapped in a dream state. You can't remember anything about yourself, where you came from, and why you've been asleep for so long. Once you wake up, you realize that the entire world has been cleansed of all human souls..! At least, so you are told by your fairy companion, Hope. You need to find other signs of human life if you wish to survive, if there are any left. However... people may have still had regrets before they passed, and it's up to you to fulfill them.. or not.

name: Radiant Devotion
summary: Radiant Devotion is a Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance fangame centered on Ike/Soren during the day of devotion festival.

name: Ravyne
summary: A classic roguelike, in which you must explore randomly generated terrain in search of a mythical artifact. Defending yourself from attackers in turn based combat along the way.

name: RaLo
summary: RaLo is a minimal yet mind-bending drumming game that requires mental agility and precise timing. Hit the correct drums at the right time, but watch out for when you need to do the opposite.

name: Rasant
summary: With your ship, face several exciting space battles, full of shots and powerful enemies. Customize your spaceship by making it more and more powerful and get ready for a space trip that will make your adrenaline skyrocket!

name: Rambell
summary: Rambell is an online and local multiplayer party game for 2-8 players. Beat up your friends in a variety of absurd games and destroy friendships in the unique collection of mini-games.

name: Race: Rocket Arena Car Extreme
summary: Race cars, fire rockets and win the league. 3D car racing action battlefield

name: Rampage Ball 2048
summary: "Rampage Ball 2048" is a classic Arkanoid game with RPG elements. Upgrade the ball and crush blocks.

name: Rat Cage
summary: On a freezing blizzard night, a lone mouse wandered into a suspicious building. Solve the mystery and escape from the terrifying building as quickly as possible.

name: Rayless Blade
summary: Venture into an unforgiving, open world and struggle alongside your team to one day, possibly, escape your terrible destiny.

name: Rainbow Run: Free Expansion Pack
summary: A new twist on Rainbow Run: the introduction of new blocks and levels provide players with challenges that they may need to use their mind and parkour skills to solve.

name: RaceRoom Racing Experience: WTCC 2015 Season Pack
summary: The WTCC 2015 Season pack contains all the cars that fought for domination in the World TouringCar Championship. From the all new Lada Vesta to the Honda Civic, the Chevrolet RML Cruze and the dominant Citroen C Elysee which remained the car to beat of the 2015 campaign.

name: RaceRoom Racing Experience: WTCC 2014 Car Pack
summary: The WTCC 2014 series marked a highlight in recent touringcar racing history, and now you get to relive all the drama and the close racing. This DLC pack contains all the TC1 cars entered by Citroën, Chevrolet, Honda and Lada, from the official works teams to the privateer entries. It's on!

name: RaceRoom Racing Experience: DTM 1992 Car Pack
summary: The word legendary is thrown around often, but on the subject of early ‘90s motorsport, the legacy of DTM race cars has proven worthy of that title. Purchase the 1992 DTM car pack and add 5 racing legends to your lineup.

name: Railway Empire: DLC Bundle
summary: The 'Railway Empire: DLC Bundle' contains all available DLCs: Mexico, the Great Lakes, Crossing the Andes, Great Britain & Ireland, France, Germany Northern Europe and Down Under.

name: Railroad Corporation: Roadmaster Mission Pack
summary: A set of different missions for a single-player sandbox gameplay with a special interaction mode and co-op missions for relaxed and long-time play.

name: Race Journey
summary: Join this Race Journey thorough the racing in the car. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Rayman ReDesigner
summary: The developer of Rayman Redemption has created an equally ambitious revision of the Rayman Designer engine, complete with the additional features and locations of the remake as well as mechanics and tools only found here.

name: Ragnarok: Fallen Legends
summary: Ragnarok: Fallen Legends is a turn-based card game based on ancient myths set on the stories of ancient gods from different cultures. The game offers a single-player roguelike mode and 2 online PVP modes. You will fight with others by playing various types of cards you draw from a shared deck.

name: Raiders of Ruin
summary: Raiders of Ruin takes the thrill of battling a mighty MMO raid boss and distils it down into a single-player experience. Study your enemies, assemble your party, and execute your strategy as you face off against dozens of challenging foes in this turn-based fantasy RPG.

name: Ravage Road
summary: Ravage Road is an indie tower defense game with deckbuilding and roguelike elements that allows the players to control and build out the road they must defend using placed tiles in addition to building towers from cards in their deck.

name: Rabbids & Ladders
summary:
A classic game with a new twist!
Collect tickets throughout the levels and try to reach the bonus wheel to win big! Four players can play this wacky game at the same time!

name: Raven's Gate
summary: You start your journey as a hero in Golden Forest and your task is to go through world slain' enemies, collecting items and helping humans in quests.

name: Rabbit & Steel
summary: Rabbit & Steel is a co-op roguelike where rabbits must team up together in raids to investigate strange happenings in the Moonlit Kingdom.

name: Raiden: 30th Anniversary
summary:
Raiden IV x Mikado remix
Raiden IV, the popular shoot ’em up arcade and console game, debuts on Nintendo Switch with remixed BGM by a superb lineup of artists produced by Game Center Mikado.
Instill fear in your enemies with devastating attacks and earn the acclaimed title of Master Ace!

Raiden V: Director's Cut
Arcade hit Raiden first left its mark on the shooting genre 25 years ago. The easy-to-learn, hard-to-master series comes to the Nintendo Switch in its most modern and advanced form yet! Join the war for Earth’s future-where the tide of battle holds constant surprises.

name: Ranata the Frog and the Broken Forest
summary: You have been summoned! help the Witch find the ingredients she needs in thiis arcade platformer.

name: Rally-X Arrangement
summary: A remake of Rally-X released first in the Namco Classic Collection Vol. 2.

name: Rally-X Remix
summary: A remixed version of Rally-X, released first in the Namco Museum Remix compilation.

name: Ray - Part 1
summary: Ray Part 1 is the first game in the Ray series of games. Get involved in the criminal underworld in this violent point-and click interactive movie with great visuals that are inspired by South Park.

name: Ray - Part 2
summary: The violence continues in this point-and-click interactive movie that takes its inspiration from South Park.

name: Rayman Arena Definitive Edition
summary: Rayman Arena Definitive Edition is simply Rayman Arena PC in its best form possible! Patched by the fans to fully work on Windows 7/10/11 and bundled with essential improvements: HD aI upscaled Textures, controller support, vibration fix, LAN patch, widescreen resolution support, custom player skins...

name: Rage 3
summary: Rage 3 is the 3rd game in the Rage series and follows the same principle, harness your rage to defeat all the enemies in front of you. Go through the Adventure mode to enjoy some platforming challenges while you beat your enemies flat into the ground. You can also unlock an Arcade mode by playing Adventure mode, and this mode lets you test the skills you've learned. Remember, those guns and swords are only your secondary weapons, your real weapon is your Rage!

name: Random Chat
summary: Based on the weekly Naver Webtoon 'Random Chat,' this new visual novel breathes life into the story by re-forming it into a love simulation game!

name: RaphaelGer's Plane
summary: Its about a plane which wants to reach his goal and escape from the earth to save RaphaelGer's life and the life from his crew.

name: Ranadinn
summary: You are a Battlemage - a Ranadinn: you have the skills of a fighter, a wizard and a cleric. You've arrived at the islands of Argentan as a mercenary, to help repel an inhuman horde from the South. Monsters have settled into caves and abandoned castles, villages are under attack, and one of the four islands has already been conquered. The king has hired you to help save his defenseless lands, and off you go on your quest: to find the secret of the invasion's leader, a mysterious sorcerer possessed by a long-dead evil, and vanquish him.

name: Ratman
summary: Ratman is a VHS found footage styled cryptid survival horror FPS focusing on combat and atmosphere as well as drawing inspiration from V/H/S/94 movie & F.E.A.R games.

name: Raccoon Rascals
summary: Climb your way to the top in this addicting one button raccoon adventure!

name: Ratatouille
summary: A Ratatouille game developed for educational handheld device Leapster.

name: Ratatouille
summary: A Ratatouille game developed for educational handheld device V.Smile.

name: Rafa's World
summary: This new game is fun for the whole family

name: Rasek
summary: Rasek is an upcoming MMORPG made in partnership between the streamer Cerol and Dumativa Game Studio for PC and mobile devices.

name: RAM: Random Access Mayhem
summary: RAM: a top-down roguelike shooter with no player character. Seize control of diverse robotic enemies, turn them against each other in frantically paced combat, and fluidly swap to fresh hosts as old ones collapse into smoldering rubble.

name: Rain Shower
summary: Mario must move his friends away from the water balloons dropped by Bowser in Modern Mode. Also, on Hard Mode, Waluigi occasionally moves the ropes around to make things harder for Mario.

name: Rattenkönig
summary: A 2D horror puzzle platformer about a rat... and a dead rat.

name: Ranbu: Sangokushi Rumble
summary: “Ranbu: Sangokushi Rumble” is a smartphone game of the Sangokushi Rumble series. It combines elements from both tower defense and hero collection systems, and features exquisite artwork from various popular web artists. The stunning 3D graphics are also the highlight of the game.

name: Rainbow Infinity
summary: Bend your fingers and set your hands on fire with this unique piano-like game about spheres and spikes! Master your own eye-hand coordination while feeling like the unknown great-grandchild of Mach or Bozart (two incredibly renowned 18th century Rainbow Infinity virtuosi).

name: Rally Drifters Racing Cars 3D: Ultimate Fast Car Gang Challange
summary:
Rally Drifters Racing is a drift based rally game and not a traffic racer. Drive with hill climb, asphalt drift, and real dirt drift. Rally with drift together. This category redefined with Rally Drifters Racing. Rally Drifters Racing introduces best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Have fun with drifty and realistic tuned physics with detailed graphics, vehicles and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, drive as Ken Blocks, and Collin McRae on the tracks not in the traffic.
Fasten your seat belt and take the control of your extremely Powerful Car!
You have mastered acceleration, braking and steering!

name: Ram Setu: The Run
summary:
Journey from one action packed situation to another, with star cast avatars inspired by the film Ram Setu, starring Akshay Kumar.
Ram Setu: Run - The Running game is a single and multiplayer non-stop action game. It’s a race in a quest to collect tokens, gems and power-ups, all while surviving the onslaught of enemy attacks, robotic drones, and wreckage.
Deal damage to enemies and escape the unpredictable as you ride, roll and jump, through this epic story deeply rooted in Indian culture and heritage.

name: Race Control Director
summary:
First time in gaming history you will be able to act as a race control director and guide races like never before.
Do you know what it feels like to control a race? Deploying yellow flags and penalise drivers? Take the chair of the race control director and guide your races to a safely and fair end for all drivers. Once you have mastered the skills of guiding a race, score as many points as you can and battle other players on the leaderboards.

name: Rapid Rocket
summary: Feel like a challenge? Guide the rocket through the rocks in this amazing, fast-paced and exciting game.

name: Rabbit Hole: Chapter 1
summary: An ancient evil has descended upon the rural town of Rabbit Hole. Now Shaun Turner not only has to untangle a twisted web of supernatural events and mysteries to save his family but also escape from the hellish remains of his hometown.

name: Radiant Flux: Hyperfractal 4.0
summary: Can you find all the secrets in this desktop hacking simulator?

name: Ranch Escape
summary:
Ranch Escape - The horse collecting arcade game
Oh no! - The horses have escaped the ranch and are running free.
Can you gather them back to the ranch?
Test your skill at collecting as many horses as you can within the time limit - Try against your friends.
Who can collect the most?

name: Rainmaker: Ultimate Trading Game
summary:
Fun and exciting way to experience stock trading with best companies on stock markets around the world. Become rich! Make millions and billions on high stake trades! Compete and compare your strategy against your friends.
Rainmaker offers fast paced trading experience in a nutshell. In just 30 seconds, you’ll experience 2 years of ups and downs in stock price changes.

name: Racers Islands
summary: Compete against some crazy drivers

name: Rainbow Slide
summary: Slide your way up the rainbow, jumping from level to level through the colored gates. Time your jump and watch out for the spikes! How far can you get?

name: Ragdoll Rage: Heroes Arena
summary: Looking for a multiplayer party game on Nintendo Switch? Ragdoll Rage: Heroes Arena is what you need: ragdoll physics, deadly fights among traps, and tons of fun! Ragdoll Rage is an incredible shooting duel in the battlegrounds full of traps.

name: Rainy Boba Cafe
summary:
Tangy and fruity or sweet and milky? The combinations are endless! Today’s interactive game Doodle celebrates bubble tea, also known as boba tea and pearl milk tea. Honeydew, matcha, raspberry, mocha – no matter the flavor, don’t forget to mix in some bubbly balls made with fruit jelly or tapioca. Bubble Tea gained such popularity globally that it was officially announced as a new emoji on this day in 2020.

This Taiwanese drink started as a local treat and has exploded in popularity over the last few decades. Bubble tea has its roots in traditional Taiwanese tea culture which dates back as early as the 17th century. However, it wasn’t until the 1980s that the bubble tea as we know today was invented. As waves of Taiwanese immigrants over the past few decades brought this drink overseas, innovation on the original bubble tea continues. Shops around the world are still experimenting with new flavors, additions, and mixtures. Traditional tearooms across Asia have also joined in on the boba craze, and the trend has reached countries like Singapore, Japan, South Korea, and more!

Satisfy your craving and make a yummy cup of bubble tea in today’s interactive Doodle, which features Taiwan’s indigenous Formosan Mountain Dog as well as a crew of familiar Doodle characters!

name: Rainbow Breakout
summary: A short and satisfying breakout concept game.

name: Race for The White House
summary: Choose Obama, or McCain and make a mad dash for The White House. Collect campaign donations to speed up your campaign.

name: Raiden III x Mikado Maniax: Deluxe Edition
summary: Deluxe Edition includes: The game, Digital Soundtrack (download code) plus a Mini Poster!

name: Ramped Up!
summary: Get ready for some pure bouncing action, satisfaction guaranteed!

name: Racing Rush
summary:
One of the best simple and fun racing game for everyone.
You have problems with the hard control or get bored of difficult levels in other current racing game? Racing Rush is what you looking for. Control your car wheel and see how it passes other cars and collects energy as well as super items on the road.
Racing Rush is a high score game. The more cars you can pass, the more score you can get. However, be careful of crashing other cars if you don’t want to lose your fuel and continue your journey.
Do you think racing in the straight line is easy? Keep balance by careful control of car wheel and accelerate your speed by using bonus item.

name: Race in Desert
summary: Race in the Desert is a racing game where your mission is to pass each mission which will not be easy at all, because you'll encounter quite difficult obstacles.

name: Rainbow Fish: The Most beautiful Fish in the Ocean
summary: Based on the best-seller children's book. Rainbow Fish is an interactive underwater adventure where you can talk and play games with sea creatures.

name: Rayland 2
summary: Welcome to Rayland. The inhabitants of this island use the energy coming from the laser beams to survive and to transport this energy they use the repeating cubes.

name: Ragnarok Survivors: Valhalla
summary: Prove to Odin that you deserve a place at the table in the afterlife and survive Ragnarok.

name: Raiding Zone
summary: No Grind just Raiding.

name: Random Thing Game
summary: This stress inducing golf-like 3D platformer will push your resolve to the limit. Climb through super-hard levels, solve puzzles, unlock hidden playable objects! Beat your highscores! Is the game too hard? Get better!

name: Raw Metal
summary: Infiltrate the depths of an exoplanet mining facility to scavenge for gear and challenge a corrupt megacorporation. Utilize gadgets and equipment in high-stakes stealth, and hone your fighting skills in breakneck combat in this stylish stealth-action dungeon crawler.

name: Ratopia
summary: Ratopia is a new game that has combined elements of both strategic survival and city building. With plenty of content available, and more planned, enjoy a vast world to adventure and populate with citizens! Build your own economical system to sustain your ideal city of Ratopia.

name: Rabat Protocol: Metal Rhapsody
summary: Join the guerrilla and take down the enemies on your vehicle in this 3D third-person shooting game! Gain EXP and upgrades by defeating enemies, choose new weapons and combat skills. Use gold gained from battles to buy tactical packs and combine them into your own combo and beat the enemies!

name: Ranger Quest: The Elemental Orbs
summary: Disaster has befallen you, but hope is not lost. Explore the libraries and learn the ancient incantations to unlock the full power of the Elemental Orbs. Completing your epic quest requires a showdown with the evil Grand Mage Marduk in his magical fortress.

name: Ravva and the Phantom Library
summary: Escape the Phantom Library! Embark into worlds of fantastic books haunted by dangerous ghosts, but you're not alone! Join Ravva and 4 unusual companions in this pixel-art platformer in cute dark-fantasy visuals! Can you face this challenge?

name: Railway Escape
summary: Battle hundreds of monsters and survive as long as you can in Railway Escape. Protect your train at all costs and upgrade your arsenal of weapons to become more powerful in this Bullet Hell game. It is up to you to clear a path to safety for you and the passengers on the last train to freedom on earth. Exciting gameplay, hordes of monsters, many weapon combinations and thrilling music will make Railway Escape your goto game when you have a few minutes to spare.

name: Racing Manager
summary: Manage your very own Racing Team. Compete in amazing 3D in high action races, controlling your drivers orders and helping them boost to victory!

name: Ragnarök TD
summary: Ragnarök TD is a 2D top-down tower defense game created as a case study of Ninja Kiwi's Bloons TD 6 by the University of Michigan's WolverineSoft Studio. Follow the story of a small village in the North as they fend off the beasts of Ragnarök in this revamped Steam iteration of the original project.

name: Rally Run
summary: Rally Run is a fast-paced, single-touch racing game you can play on the go, with engaging racing, nitro-boosting and drifting mechanics - you won't have raced like this before!

name: Raid Leader
summary:
Encounter challenging boss fights. Collect gold and invest in dozens of unlockable abilities. Test your skills against the oncoming hordes of darkness.
Are you prepared?

name: Race on Ice 2022 Pro
summary: Race On Ice 2022 Pro is an ice racing game where you can drive 28 drivers of the year 2021-2022 of the category Pro and Lite . The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race.

name: Race on Ice 2021 Pro
summary: Race On Ice 2021 Pro is an ice racing game where you can drive the drivers of the year 2021 . The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. But be careful because depending on the driver you take, it will be more difficult to win the race.

name: Race on Ice 2020 Pro
summary: Race On Ice 2020 Pro is an ice racing game where you can drive the drivers of the year 2020 . The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. But be careful because depending on the driver you take, it will be more difficult to win the race.

name: Rally Point 3
summary:
Get ready... Go!
Welcome to Xform Games' first steps into mobile gaming!
Push your car to the limit, but don't overheat your engine. How far can you go?
Unlock new cars and tracks by beating the target time. Have fun!
More Rally Point coming soon!

name: R.A.T.T.Z. Maze
summary: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a Mouse? Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be inside of a Maze? Wonder no more! In R.A.T.T.Z. Maze you will have to rely on the mouse to smell, and your brain to remember! Welcome to the Maze, Good luck!

name: Raiders of Valhalla
summary: Manage an army of Viking dwarves and lead them to victory! Give them new weapons and armor, choose a village to raid, and watch them destroy everything, get stronger and do it all over again! How far can you go?

name: Ragmonton
summary: Ragmonton is a Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike > Fight enemies by collecting and combining your body parts for special powers, discover transformations, acquire unique relics and modify your power in a way that every run is unique.

name: Raindrop Umbrella
summary: Sometimes to attack, sometimes to move. Kick your enemies to the ground with umbrella actions. A devastated land. Two opposing races. What is the secret of the world where it keeps raining? ...... A short 2D action game drawn with dots.

name: RaceCraft
summary: Don't you wish you could build your own crazy stunt courses? Now you can with RaceCraft! Drive like thunder on your light-powered tracks in the universe's coolest cars. Time to put your crafting and racing skills to the test! Do you have what it takes to be a RaceCraft champion?

name: Rage Quit
summary: Start with up to 999 lives in this mad dash for survival through a fast-paced digital gauntlet of lasers, UFOS, meteors,and giant fists! With twenty levels and five difficulty settings, there are plenty of challenges ahead! Earn medals for your achievements!

name: Rada Quest
summary: Rada Quest TCG is a game that combines real-time strategy and card collecting. You can produce resources in your realm, power up your deck, and earn exclusive rewards in events and quests.

name: Raise
summary: AI pet simulation game, developed by ABA Inc.

name: Random Dice: Go
summary:
Random Dice: Go is a real-time, auto-battle strategy game where every choice matters.
Claim victory by countering the opponent's strategy and placing the right Dice in the right place.
Always think strategically about your next move.

name: Railway Company Owner
summary: Railroad Tycoon is a puzzle train simulator video game. build a railway city bigger and more complex than anyone could ever imagine. Build your city into the biggest railroad city in the world.

name: Radical Road
summary: A casual, arcade, one button game about getting a car to go as far as it can on an infinitely procedually generated road, while collecting coins.

name: RayStorm x RayCrisis HD Collection
summary: Relive the excitement of lock-on laser shooting and epic sci-fi battles with two of TAITO’s most respected vertical shoot‘em ups – Both original arcade and HD versions!

name: Race of Life
summary: Race of Life is a college/street racing Adult Visual Novel. Take a peek into the underground racing scene, where suck, squeeze, bang, blow is about more than just your engine cycle. Race and upgrade your car to take control over your future. The more rubber you burn, the more money you earn.

name: Race Illegal
summary:
The smell of freshly burnt rubber on tarmac, the feel of the soft leather in your hands, the sound of engines roaring and crowds cheering, open your eyes and experience racing in its purest form, get ready to take to the streets in Race Illegal.
Finally the true street racing experience has arrived on your phone. Starting your career as a rookie; you need to earn respect out there before you can challenge the best, work your way through an intense and engaging storyline to prove yourself top dog. With 20 tracks to race, 9 cars to choose from and a whole host of customisations there’s plenty here for the petrol-head to tinker with.
Real driving physics, insane drifts and nitrous boosts and some of the most visually stunning locations to drive around, Race Illegal has it all. Check out your own driving stats and compare your times and honours with other players worldwide.
Have you got what it takes to Race Illegal?

name: Rad Survivor
summary: Cartoon rougelite survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

name: Railways: Train Simulator
summary: Mind the gap and start managing your railways through this strategic journey! All aboard! This train is ready to depart!

name: Rabbi-T
summary: Save Wilson Toys Inc. from the villainous robot ACTO and be a hero. Rabbi-T is a 2D running action game that pursues destruction and speed. Destroy obstacles to run faster. Reach the boss's weakness as fast as possible.

name: Radiant Tale: Fanfare!
summary: Fandisc for Radiant Tale.

name: Rainbow Jigsaw
summary: A simple jigsaw game, pictures are colorful things. You can use images from your favorite website, there is no need to restart game, or rename your image. And you don't need to change format or size.

name: Rally Race Car Simulator Poly: World Driver Arcade Real Driving Games Sim
summary: Ready, set, go! Get behind the wheel and let's hit the road for an adrenaline-fueled car game!

name: Ra Ra Boom
summary: Ra Ra Boom is a 2D, co-op beat ’em up driven by a coming-of-age narrative about a group of ninja cheerleaders from space in a fight to save the rest of humanity on Earth.

name: Race Horses Champions 3

The 3D graphics has been improved bringing great experiences and emotions of a horse race in a immersive environment. Managing your money and your stable, the player buys his horses, which has its own attributes, and participates in events to test their skills.

name: Racing Limits
