Based on racing and overtaking vehicles both in city and highway traffic, this game features 5 enjoyable modes of racing: carrier mode, infinite mode, against-time mode, free mode and a multiplayer mode. You can choose between one-way and two-way traffic and choose among three times of day periods, namely “Morning”, “Sunset” and “Night”.

name: Racing Days
summary: Racing Days is a driving game developed by Kitt Peak for Mac and the Apple Pippin consoles.

name: Raptor Rush
summary: The game features a dynamic day and night system that adds a new level of challenge and excitement to the game. You'll be able to see the stunning visuals change as you progress through each level, keeping you engaged and immersed in the game.

name: Ratyboy Adventures
summary: In this 3D platformer game where we play as a mouse living in a big house, we try to collect the stars placed at certain points in the rooms of the house and overcome the challenging platform

name: Rafa's World + Axolotl + Cat Milk
summary:
Take on the role of the boy Rafa in his own world full of creatures, monsters, diamonds, emeralds, boxes and a little shop to buy power-ups.

Explore over 50 different areas while trying to manage your stamina, passing through many types of traps.

This is a white little cat who loves to jump and to get into adventures around the town until he finds milk to drink. Once he accomplishes his mission, then it is time to go home.

name: Rapid Roller
summary: Roll in a minimalistic, colorful world and see how far you can travel! Roll over jump pads for extra score. But don't hit the walls or spikes!

name: Rainbow Splash
summary: Discover what’s at the end of the rainbow in the new addictive puzzle game, Rainbow Splash! Seemingly simple in concept, this game will test your puzzle solving skills. As you progress through the game, you’ll reveal new acts each with a new twist. Finally when you’re ready, try the challenge mode to truly put your skills to the test.

name: Rat vs. Cat
summary: Mr. Joey Mouse has a very sweet and little dream of filling his hole with all the cheese of this world.

name: Rage Racing 3D
summary: Like Parkour? Or Racing games? Enjoy them all in our game, this is the only chance in market.

name: Ragnarok Tactics
summary:
Ragnarök Tactics is a tactical mobile game based on Ragnarok Online.

The international servers closed their servers on May 18 of 2022 after a scant 2 years of operation.

name: Rayflector
summary: Rayflector is a bite-sized game about using the mirrors and other to direct a stream of particles to the receptacles.

name: Rainbowcore Hypernova
summary: Unleash your inner fighter in Rainbowcore Hypernova, the explosively fun and free fighting game featuring vibrant characters, easy controls, and dynamic battles

name: Raccoon Rascals
summary:
Ever wanted to play a game as a greedy raccoon, scaling the largest buildings ever built while collecting juicy pies on the way..? Well this game isn’t that.. Wait, yes it is, it’s just that and more!
Climb your way to the top in this addicting one button raccoon adventure! Featuring addicting single tap gameplay, 20+ characters to unlock, fun achievements, and more!

name: RagBrawl
summary: Get ready to ragdoll in RagBrawl! Compete as a floppy Tuffling toy with up to 12 players online and show them your stuff in this chaotic party game!

name: Randoville
summary: Randoville is a medieval chill-builder where everything is decided by your luck! Will you get a shabby hut or a gorgeous palace? Throw D20 and find out!

name: Raids Inc.
summary: I fused different RPG mechanics trying to bring something fresh to the gaming community. Сlimb the bizarre towers! Fight with fascinating monsters! Loot! Gain experience! Upgrade your abilities and skills!

name: Rainbow Warhead
summary: "Rainbow Warhead" is a Q version of the shooting competition and RPG training set in one of the battle games! PVP,PVE and other modes, competition, PK! Real-time match, and friends team up to the top of the strongest king! Play is the pleasure of shooting, come to open your road to the king!

name: Raios Funde
summary:
Raios Funde, a word guessing game that follows a scary aesthetic, its differential is having a connection to Twitch, in which the chat actively participates with its player.
The game has the mechanic for the player to guess the word in the chat or to create the word for his chat to guess.
Thus having multiple tools to entertain the gameplay such as: time, chances and word hints.

name: Racing Empires
summary: Are you an adrenaline junky? Check out Racing Empires for the perfect mix of racing, strategy building and amazing graphics! Build your city and establish the ultimate drag racing empire! Design your own track, trick out your cars, drift hard and drive even faster to become king of the streets!

name: Rack and Slay
summary: A rogue-like dungeon crawler where you're a billiard ball. Push monster balls into holes or traps in randomly generated levels. Draft stackable items with game-changing effects to build synergies.

name: Racing in Car
summary: Racing in Car offers the soul of motor racing in the most beautiful,authentic and advanced racing game.

name: Raging Bytes
summary: Raging Bytes is a story-driven zombie RPG full of drama and pixels! Survive the raging bytes! With difficulty levels for all kinds of players, dive into this post-apocalyptic world and face zombies in turn-based battles!

name: Rapid Stream
summary: The player must guide a submarine through a path without crashing into walls (which will explode the submarine on contact), while shooting at enemies.

name: Ralph Breaks VR
summary: A companion to the films Wreck-It Ralph and its sequel Ralph Breaks the Internet, developed with input by its directors Phil Johnston and Rich Moore. It was a continuation of The Void's collaborations with Disney and ILMxLab now also involving Walt Disney Animation Studios. It consists of a series of minigames set within the sequel's portrayal of the Internet, including a sequence (referencing a children's mobile game seen in the film's trailer) where the players must fight off invading bunnies and kittens using pancakes and milkshakes as ammo. It was written by Ralph Breaks the Internet screenwriter Pamela Ribon in collaboration with Tracy Hickman. Direction was again done as a creative collaboration between The VOID and ILMxLab.

name: Raiding.Zone
summary: Raiding.Zone​ is a pve arena game inspired by World of Warcraft and Warframe. The gameplay is oriented around the roles Tank, Healer and Damage-Dealer.

name: Rainy Day
summary: Rainy Day is a point and click adventure game that contains our beautiful and sad memories.

name: Racing Guy
summary: One of Nice Code's earliest titles. The player must build one of four toy cars by installing preset parts onto it; after this, they can compete in "Power" (a game of Tug-of-War with two cars), "Championship" (a "race" that literally does nothing and controls itself), and "Distance" (inexplicably, a hack of Javelin Throw from Track & Field).

name: Raimodula
summary: Raimodula is a dynamic arcade platformer, featuring customizable characters and randomized progression. Unlock habilities, fight modular enemies and navigate surreal environments with polished controls and intense gameplay!

name: Ragnarock: Vikings On Tour
summary: Lead your viking ship to victory in this rhythm game! Pound your drums to the sound of epic music, from celtic rock to viking power metal, and set sail against your rivals in multiplayer mode. Will you outrace them all and carve your name on top of the leaderboard?

name: Radiated Life
summary: You are satan, trying to make the only survivors of the apocalypse leave God's side. Give instructions to your people, and make them build a habitable base. God is trying to make you fail, by attacking your humans with dangers that won't kill them, but make surviving harder.

name: Rainbow Rendezvous
summary: Rainbow Rendezvous is a delightful and colorful cartoon-style endless runner game

name: Rapid Fire Brigade
summary:
Rapid Fire Brigade, the ultimate retro shooter experience!

Embark on an exhilarating journey in Rapid Fire Brigade, the ultimate retro arcade shooter game that promises hours of addictive, action-packed gameplay. Conquer captivating levels, become an arcade hero, and immerse yourself in a world filled with intense battles and strategic decisions.

Begin with basic weapons and gradually upgrade your arsenal to an unbeatable powerhouse. Complete missions to earn rewards, enhance your character, and master an array of formidable weapons. Make smart choices by selecting the right weapons and power-ups for each mission, upgrading your character, and unlocking new abilities in the skill tree to boost your firepower.

Experience challenging levels brimming with secrets, formidable bosses, and enthralling gameplay twists! Revel in stunning retro-inspired graphics and effects that transport you back in time.

name: Randal's Tuesday
summary: Everything begins on a Wednesday, early in the morning. Our three protagonists are testifying in front of the Student Council leaded by no other than the Dean himself. They have been accused of committing a horrendous act (players don’t know about it just yet) and this is the only chance they have to try and clean their names.

name: Railway Empire 2: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Railway Empire 2 game, the original soundtrack, exclusive skins for each of the three sizes of your railway stations, an exclusive skin for your company HQ, and an exclusive skin for two locomotives.

name: Rabbit Simulator
summary: An Action-Adventure game. Gameplay consists of mainly bullet-hell and shooting, but also features puzzles and mini-games.

name: Radio Ball 3D
summary: A fun, radioactive, fast-paced, accelerometer driven 3D game. Radio Ball 3D! The accelerometer controlled tunnel game. A uranium ball driven by radioactive waste rushes through the tunnel. Can you reach the end? Go as far as you can, collect power-ups, do combos, avoid or destroy obstacles. Get your score as high as possible and keep rollin'.

name: Race Driver: Grid
summary: Grid will take players to beautifully realised and dramatic race locations over three continents to compete in an unprecedented variety of racing events. Packed with the most powerful race cars – new and classic, circuit and drift – players will compete to conquer the most prestigious official race tracks and championships and then go beyond to compete in challenging city-based competitions, through to road events and urban street races.

name: Rainbow High: Runway Rush
summary: Play as the Rainbow High girls, explore the school and use their unique talents to complete your first art assignment. #LetYourTrueColorsShine

name: Radio Exurbia
summary: Radio Exurbia is a driving game about music and discovery as you explore a surreal landscape of twisted suburbs and sentient muscle cars. Use your Reality-Modulating radio to swap between worlds as you experience the stability of suburbia and the sublime excitement of the unknown, all set to a high-octane original soundtrack. Turn the key, tune in and swap worlds.

name: Ravenhaul
summary:
Queen Isadora III needs a high performing avian delivery service, and you are the right one to make her happy!

Get birds, get patrons, get contracts - Work hard, peck hard, enjoy your hard earned kernels, that's how we roll in bird county.

name: Rainbow Runner
summary: It's time to take a run on the rainbow of colors and fun!

name: RabbitConquest
summary: In this game rabbits rule civilization.

name: Rainbow Witch
summary: In this game you can not attack. You will have to send back the bullets that are coming your way!

name: Rap Simulator
summary: Rap Simulator is in basically a production with a great deal of humour. The action starts in the 80s of the last century. The player takes on the role of a rapper who sets up his first music studio in a rented apartment. Our task is to break out of the underground and become a part of the mainstream for good, opening our own label or creating the best clothing brand. Beefs, chases, money, green leaves, shootings, gang wars or maybe a softer way to success? The way the player chooses to reach the top will depend only on him/her. At the beginning of the game, the player's budget is limited, so you have to decide which aspect of the production you want to devote more attention to at the cost of the other elements.

name: Raventure
summary: In Raventure, you play as a brave warrior on a perilous journey across a scorching desert.

name: Raven: The Goblin Hunter
summary: It's time to descend into the underground tunnels and defeat the Goblin King who persecutes your People! Use your weapons, prepare your spells and destroy tens of thousands of Goblins! Raven is a TPS Isometric 3D Roguelike Shooting Game. Solve the Puzzles and Hunt the Goblins!

name: Railway Empire 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Railway Empire 2 game, the original soundtrack, exclusive skins for each of the three sizes of your railway stations, an exclusive skin for your company HQ, and an exclusive skin for two locomotives.

name: Racing Drift Taxi Car Simulator Ultimate
summary: Skillful driving in the city is a very important skill for a taxi driver.

name: Rainbow hotel
summary: Short game. You are in hotell attacked by rainbow animals. You have to find keys and run out!

name: Race Day
summary:
Race against friends or random opponents!
Race Day is a fun and physics based real-time multiplayer racing game. Compete with up to four players for the top spot. Races are short and intense, perfect for a quick multiplayer game whenever you have a short break! Increase your skill level to unlock new cars and addons.

name: Racket Club
summary: Racket Club takes all the fun of tennis or pickleball and puts it in a box to create a brand new racket sport, built from the ground up for VR.

name: Raid over Moscow
summary: The USSR has launched a huge attack on the USA, and the only hope for the free world is for you (as leader of a US Squadron of fighters) to destroy their defense bases. This is done in a multi-stage action game with some similarities to the same developer's Beach Head. All the mini-games must be completed before the time limit on the bomb is expired.

name: Radix Chronicle
summary: Radix is a tactical RPG inspired by SNES and early Playstation classics. With dark themes but bright characters, this fantasy tale changes depending on how you fight! Your magic can even alter the land itself. Use your timing and skill, rather than your luck, to lead your party home safely each day!

name: Rap Attack!
summary: Tour around the world and become a rap star in this fun 2D pixel-art platformer!

name: Rain on their Parade!
summary:
Side-scrolling rain shooting (?) game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 53.

You’re a rain delivery cloud at Cloud Academy, but you’re on your way to flunking the year!

(Nobody told you that raining cats and dogs wasn’t meant to be literal...)

Pass these rainy assignments or you’ll be stuck on golf course sprinkler duty all summer!

name: Ragdoll Destroyer
summary: Your goal is to destroy a ragdoll character. Customize your ragdoll to your liking, select a room, and let the fun begin! Doing more damage to the ragdoll will help you unlock tools, including a crusher, cannon, rocket launcher, spikes, and more.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando
summary: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Ratchet & Clank
summary: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal
summary: A remaster of the PlayStation 2 Ratchet & Clank: Up Your Arsenal, featuring 720p HD with support for 3D graphics and PlayStation Network trophies.

name: Ragnarock: Sabaton Raid
summary: This new DLC for the Rhythm game Ragnarock brings you a unique collaboration with the epic band Sabaton.

name: Racing in Motor
summary:
Third person view perspective, better graphics and real car sounds.Riding motorcycle is the best mobile racing game you have been looking for.
Tilt your device to drag your motor wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn coins and buy new motor. Tilt your device to lean your bike and touch the screen to accelerate/brake.

name: Rafting Frenzy
summary: It's rafting time! Rafting Frenzy is a rafting game where you're going to need both luck and skill to get a big score on either racing or free rafting modes.

name: Raw Nerve
summary: Raw Nerve is an easy-to-play, hard-to-master driving sandbox set in a psychedelic galaxy. Take a casual rip or sprint to the summit for a top time. It’s one truckin' awesome ride.

name: Ramen Oil Pecking Simulator
summary: Have you ever wanted to collect oil floating in a bowl of ramen by pulling it with chopsticks? This game will completely satisfy your desire to do so!

name: Radiant Tale: Special Edition
summary:
The special edition of Radiant Tale comes with a special booklet and a drama CD.

Today's customers at Rebel where Tifalia works, are a unique group of people who called themselves the Circus.

Their first performance was not a success. Tifalia forces to join as an assistant and producer after hearing "What is lacking in the current Circus is mediocre like you!" She was worried all night wondering how she going on a journey, but with her family's words, she decided to participate.

A crazy dragon that loves to tickle, a spikey clown that doesn't make you laugh, a water creature who doesn't want to use water magic, an acrobat who doesn't know how to entertain, a drunkard furball, an unmotivated leader, and an amateur producer who just joined.

Will they be able to perform successfully in front of crowds?

name: Razgovor Online
summary: Razgovor is an instanced based open world Metavers. Providing you new ways to explore and ways to interact with others around you. Create a new experiance alone, with friends or with people you meet on the way.

name: Railway Empire 2: Nintendo Switch Edition
summary: In Railway Empire 2 – Nintendo Switch Edition, take over a small railway company in the early 1800s, grow it into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors as you connect cities and companies with an ever-expanding network of rail lines, bridges, and tunnels. Railway Empire 2 features bigger, more detailed and lively maps than ever before, focusing on iconic regions of the USA and Europe. Improved track construction helps you focus on the important decisions as you drive the economy and help the growth of the cities. Signals are placed automatically, bridges can hold more than 4 tracks and the expandable train stations can now have up to 8 tracks.

name: Radirgy Noa
summary: Radirgy Noa (also written as Radirgynoa) is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up that was released in June 2009 for the Sega Naomi arcade platform by Milestone Inc. and the sequel to Radirgy. It was later released on February 25, 2010, in Japan for the Wii under the name Radirgy Noa Wii, distributed by LUCKY Co. LTD. It was also ported to the Xbox 360 on October 28, 2010, with new features, as Radirgy Noa Massive. A Microsoft Windows version was released on February 25, 2011, as part of the Milestone Sound Collection.

name: Radirgy Noa Wii
summary: Radirgy Noa (also written as Radirgynoa) is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up that was released in June 2009 for the Sega Naomi arcade platform by Milestone Inc. and the sequel to Radirgy. It was later released on February 25, 2010, in Japan for the Wii under the name Radirgy Noa Wii, distributed by LUCKY Co. LTD. It was also ported to the Xbox 360 on October 28, 2010, with new features, as Radirgy Noa Massive. A Microsoft Windows version was released on February 25, 2011, as part of the Milestone Sound Collection.

name: Radirgy 2
summary: Radirgy 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the arcade-style shoot 'em up Radirgy, returning to its roots with classic vertical scrolling gameplay. Players choose between two ships, one with traditional controls and the other offering twin-stick mechanics.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids
summary: PlayStation 2 port of Rayman Raving Rabbids.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids
summary: Xbox 360 port of Rayman Raving Rabbids.

name: Ratchet: Deadlocked
summary: A high-definition remaster version for the PlayStation 3, featuring 1080p upscaling.

name: Rage of Blades
summary:
Rage of Blades is a brutal and unforgiving online PvP action/fighting game that brings players to the heart of medieval combat. From the blood-soaked battlefields of Northern Arenas to the sun-baked Arenas of South, warriors from across the globe have come together to test their mettle in one-on-one duels that will leave only the strongest standing.
Choose your fighter from a cast of legendary warriors including Vikings, Knights, Assassins and more. Each warrior brings their own unique style and skills to the fray, challenging you to master new strategies and techniques as you fight your way to the top.

name: Radiant Reckoning: Subterranean Odyssey
summary: The only way to play is to survive every raids. The more you explore the open world more you get better loots.

name: Railed Up
summary: A shooter inside tramways on suspended railways viewed from below, set in a dystopian future.

name: Ramp Car Racing
summary: Get behind the wheel and let the thrill begin!

name: Racing Combat
summary: Racing Combat is super fun multiplayer racing battle game. Are you a hero racing fighter for your top position? than let's clash with real opponents worldwide or with your friends. Win races to discover new awesome cars & power cards. Upgrade your power drivers to defeat other traffic rider in real-time. Form Gadgets to Weapons to Spells, Racing Combat has dozens of cards to load in your combat deck. Win Trophies and Chests to lead your path to victories!

name: Rachel and Ariane
summary:
It is Halloween and Rachel is going to a costume party a local college bar is having across the street from her off-campus condo.

She wears a sexy costume she knows at the very least would turn a few eyes her way. Hopefully, she can win the contest too.

Things don’t quite go as planned, however, as her costume turns out not to be so unique.

In anticipation of Something’s In The Air Redux coming in April, the separate purchase of the older Something’s In The Air and Rachel Meets Ariane has been discontinued. Rachel Meets Ariane will be included as a bonus in the Somethings In The Air Redux game.

name: Ravenbound: Hammers of Ávalt
summary: The Hammers of Ávalt DLC introduces the new hammer weapon archetype to Ravenbound. This pack adds hammer cards with unique stats and effects that you can collect and equip while exploring Ávalt, to help you on your journey towards defeating the Betrayer.

name: Race Boat Simulator
summary: Get ready to experience the ultimate speed sensation!Feel the speed and conquer the waves!

name: Raising Archangel
summary: Minimize taps and clicks! Let's have fun thanks to an easy and fast progress!

name: Race Pro
summary:
Race Pro is an endless racing game with incredible graphics and realistic driving control, in a city.
Drive car through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones.
Complete career mode to show off your amazing car driving skills, and become the best professional driver.

name: Rally Clash
summary: Jump, drift and pass your way through challenging tracks in the only mobile game based entirely on the thrilling sport of rallycross, where car racing meets motocross! One-handed thumb-swipe steering makes playing simple, but beating others to the finish line is a more difficult task.

name: Racoon the Thief
summary: Racoons are hungry and they are looking for food. The only way to get the food at the moment seems to be very difficult, now it is your job to help them to enter into the Big Fat Neighbor's house and...

name: Radar N Rockets
summary: Think you can handle air radar and a rocket launcher at once? Take down as many enemies as possible.

name: Radzone
summary:
Psychological warfare, tense atmosphere. Deploy your buildings and units. Make alliances. Wait for the first nuke. Choose how you will respond. Betray your allies. Protect your citizens, nuke the rest of the world. Peace is near.
Radzone superbly evokes the tension, paranoia and suspicion of the Cold War era, playing on the fascinating aspects of psychological gameplay that occur during strategic nuclear warfare.

name: Raptoid
summary: Raptoid is a gay scaly bdsm themed beat-em-up game and an homage to the classic video games of the 90s, featuring lots of kinky game mechanics, enemy grapples and a fighting system that was was developed with empowerment and fun in mind.

name: Raccoon Pizza Rush
summary:
Rocky has a business proposition for you! Help him start a New York City food delivery service in this fast paced action game. Food on demand is a big business in the city that never sleeps! You’ll begin by delivering pizza, but new friends will help Rocky expand by bringing their favorite treats like ice cream and sushi. Deliver pizza, grow your business, and take the Big Apple by storm.

Enjoy one tap input in this simple side scrolling runner. Hold down to stop Rocky from getting crushed by traffic. He just wants to keep running, but you’ve got to get him to his destination with both him and the pizza intact.

name: Rayne the Rogue
summary: As a child Rayne watched the rich from the streets of the village and burned with jealousy. After years and years of poverty an idea formed. Rayne has decided to sneak into the lairs of dragons and steel their treasures. Rayne need your help to navigate the dangerous caves and avoid the dragon’s breath to become the wealthiest person in the village, but take heed, the further Rayne gets the more treacherous it will be.

name: Ranveer vs. Wild With Bear Grylls
summary: Bear Grylls is bringing his survival skills. Ranveer Singh is bringing his endless energy. Want to lead this mission? Bring your appetite for adventure.

name: Raini: The Lords of Light
summary:
Collect, Build, Fight! Join us in RTLOL, the tactical trading card game and battle to be the greatest hero, building decks full of powerful spells and loyal minions in a battle for domination of the Rainiverse.

A true TCG for card game enthusiasts new and old!

name: Rainy Days In Casablanca
summary: Rainy Days In Casablanca is a limit-removing Doom II project from various members of Doomer Boards, led by joe-ilya. Welcome to the winter of 1900's Casablanca; the land of big casinos, dark alleys and singing skeletons.

name: Raceway
summary: Animal go-carting at its finest! Grab your friends, pick your favourite cute animal racer, and go for gold!

name: Random Merge Defense
summary: Simple, Addictive The "Random Merge Defense"

name: Rabid Helix
summary: In this game, you are the medic of a corporate security team in some sci-fi setting sent to investigate a long-abandoned research installation owned by the company's predecessor. Similar to the lieutenant of the Colonial Marines in Aliens, you sit behind a bank of monitors and observe your teammates' status as they investigate the interior of this compound. And like Aliens, something nasty is waiting for them inside.

name: Ralph Baer's Pinball!
summary: A completely new and updated rendition of Ralph Baer's prototype Pinball!, featuring enhanced graphics, multiple table layouts and more! As well as including the original game, it also adds a new two-player version.

name: Raccoon Adventure
summary: In this thrilling simulation game, you get to experience life through the eyes of an adorable and cunning raccoon. Explore a bustling suburban neighborhood filled with countless opportunities for adventure, mischief, and plenty of snacks to scavenge!

name: Rat Catcher
summary: Embark on a perilous journey as a fearless rat catcher in this nostalgic 90's-inspired dungeon crawler horror game. Explore dark and treacherous dungeons, facing off against horrifying monsters and collecting an array of eerie rats. Can you survive the darkness and emerge as the ultimate hero?

name: Radiant: Guardians of Light
summary: Embark on an epic quest in "Radiant: Guardians of Light." Chosen by the spirit of light, battle against Gultar, and his corrupted elemental bosses. Unleash your powers, and team up in solo or coop mode to save the realm from tyranny. Will you restore balance or succumb to eternal darkness?

name: Rarity Chase
summary: Rarity Chase is an adventure for board game fans. Quickly learn simple rules, roll the die and go in search of an ancient artifact. Find and wisely use resources and bonuses. Play alone against AI, with friends on the same computer or online.

name: Rainette
summary: Rainette is an indie 3D platformer. Explore levels, get cosmetics, and get the best times!

name: Ranphon
summary: Ranphon is a side-scrolling space shooter where you control a small ship called Phon in a vast and frantic space full of hostile spaceships.

name: RaidKids
summary: Still, the boy keeps walking.

name: Rabbicent Adventures
summary: Here you have to make your way through various obstacles to get to the rabbit castle, on the way you will have a lot of adventures and confrontations with various enemies, use your hare agility and quickness to overcome them.

name: Racketeers
summary: Form the most infamous criminal organization you can. Engage in numerous rackets, hire underlings, defend your turf, brew and mix contraband to distribute, run brothels, whack rival gangsters. Manage your criminal empire to earn millions. Become the most feared of the RACKETEERS!

name: Ratyrinth
summary: You are drastically separated from your family in a scary forest with dangerous creatures, and you have to find them again! Ratyrinth is a cute and challenging precision platformer.

name: Rainbow Rockets!
summary: Rainbow Rockets is a purpose built 2 player game to enjoy with friends! With it's unique colour matching control system you'll be addicted in minutes as you start tilting your device to match all the colours of the rainbow to set off your rockets! If you struggle you can always try the tap edition and race against your friends using either version!

name: Ratatan
summary: Ratata Arts and TVT have announced Ratatan, a new rhythm action game from the creator of Patapon previously teased as Project JabberWocky.

name: Raindrop Sprinters
summary: Avoid rain, get stars, and run across the passage!

name: Ramos Ruy no World Wide Soccer
summary: A Japanese version of Tony Meola's Sidekicks Soccer, but with a different player endorsement.

name: Ray Mohawk's Manic Monday
summary: Ray Mohawk is a 100% vanilla-compatible mini-episode for Doom 2. 6 maps of fun and sun to blaze through - engaging, but never unfair. Despite having a bit of a beachy theme, these maps are mostly Classic Doom, just like momma used to make, but with a dash of palm trees, bright blue skies and a cruisy, light-hearted soundtrack.

name: Ray Mohawk 2: Ray Wreaks Havoc!
summary: Ray is BACK and ready for more vanilla-compatible action in the tropics! This is a community project and sequel to my older wad, Ray Mohawk's Manic Monday.

name: Racerloop
summary: Racerloop is a zero-gravity arcade racing game based on the Outer Ring universe where you take on a new challenge to be the fastest in the universe. In Racerloop, you will be able to customize and upgrade your ships, trading and exchanging parts and vehicles in a blockchain-based economy and marketplace.

name: Rageblocks
summary: "Rageblocks" - Block Stapling Redefined! Unleash Sidescrolling Powerdowns, create 8x8 Mega Chunks and multiply your score! An electrifying puzzle revolution awaits!

name: R-Ack
summary:
R-Ack (Pronounced "Are Ah-ck") is a "No Rules" collaboration similar to the Yumps and the VIPs where there is no level design standard. The title has a hidden meaning, referencing the abstract term "RomhACK" where anything goes so long as it's a romhack.

Featuring 35+ levels that totals to 50 exits. Set aside your expectations, as this hack is anything but normal. Actually, inside the chaos could be something normal? Who knows.

You control an entity known as "The Plumber" in search to find the good in the world of R-ACK. Your mission is to simply traverse the landscapes.

name: Rage of Mechs
summary: Experience intense mech battles in the post-apocalyptic wasteland of Rage of Mechs. Command powerful mechs, upgrade weapons, and strategize in multiplayer sessions. Unleash your rage and conquer the wasteland!

name: Rapis the Bullet
summary: It is a Danmaku shooter ...... but the protagonist cannot shoot bullets. She only has a sword.

name: Random Dungeon
summary:
Dungeon crawler RPG with light town-building elements created in RPG Maker VX by hamusuta. The player controls a trio of adventurers exploring a mysterious dungeon in order to gather funds to revitalize their town. The loot in the dungeon is randomized, with battles being turn-based affairs heavily dependent on the use of status and buffs/debuffs, as well as the right equipment.

The story is mostly humorous and unapologetically yuri, and is presented in a somewhat non-linear manner, with story scenes being unlocked by achieving certain conditions (for example, finding a random weapon in the dungeon, raising your affinity level with a certain character, or using a facility in the town a certain number of times). While the game uses a traditional leveling system, smart use of strategy is rewarded in the form of additional loot and bonus EXP awarded for beating the bosses below a recommended level.

name: Rain & Chamomile Tea
summary: The story of a girl who wakes up in an unfamiliar beachside town after a nightmarish sort of mania. The air is thick with fog and the smell of rot; it almost seems as if something is hiding from her.

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project
summary:
Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project (commonly known as RAMP) was a mapping event held in June and July 2021 by David Newton (DavidN) aimed at encouraging newcomers to try mapping for Doom, much like the Doom Upstart Mapping Project which inspired this project. Mappers of all skill levels and experience were welcome to participate and were allowed to map in any map format, with the entire project being tied together using GZDoom and maps being loaded from a hub level. Mappers submitted their maps to a site created specifically for the project by DavidN, which included a new tool to automatically compile new maps into the project as they were uploaded to the site.

This project has 209 maps.

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project 2022
summary:
RAMP 2022 is the second iteration of the Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project! In June 2022, mappers old and new came together to create their own maps for Doom 2 centered around a gigantic 117-map hub level.

Once again, take the chance to dip into one of the widest variety packs in the Doom community - explore icy castles, wade through flooded techbases, visit hellish caves, and take part in several strange demonic games. Also collect paintings and hang them up around the hub to spruce it up a bit - a massive thanks to the various artists around the Doom fandom that generously provided their artwork for use in the game!

name: Rabbit's All-Comers Mapping Project 2023
summary: RAMP 2023 is the third edition of the Rabbit's All-comers Mapping Project! Like the others before it, it's a compilation of 296 maps submitted by members of the Doom community, both new and old. The game is centered around a hub level, with completion of the submitted maps allowing players to progress in the hub.

name: Rally 3D
summary: Racing game for java cellphones in wich you can select from three modes - Championship, Time Trial and Multiplayer over Bluetooth connection.

name: Ramas' Call: Twisted Timing
summary: Point and Click adventure in a medieval fantasy ambience. Imagine you are a random tabletop geek looking for new adventures and your friend makes a tiiny mistake with his time machine... Now add an adventurer, a noble and a detective and mix them all together in yourself. Must be fun, right?

name: Raider: Dark Age
summary: Raider: Dark Age is a hardcore PvPvE extraction looter set in a brutal medieval world. Survive horrific beasts and cut-throat bandits while battling to bring home mythical treasure with your friends.

name: Raccoon Squad
summary:
A game about raccoons.
Sneak into people's houses and steal food, furniture and everything else!
Get away with the goods and fill the raccoon dumpster!
Watch out for the guards trying to catch you!

name: Rapala Pro Bass Fishing
summary: Rapala Pro Bass Fishing has you testing your fishing skills in a tournament setting against real-life professionals. Structured similarly to a televised event, the presentation includes professional announcing from In-Fisherman TV's Barry Brueland, "live" updates, leaderboards, analysis, and weigh-ins. There are over 20 tournament events in each season as you attempt to win the championship trophy. To ensure your success on some of the leading freshwater lakes in North America, you'll choose from an assortment of licensed boats, lures, rods, and apparel. In addition to the single-player season, a friend can participate in over 50 events geared specifically for multiplayer competition. You'll battle head-to-head in various timed, accuracy, weight, and location-based challenges.

name: Raddoll
summary: A ragdoll physics infinite runner

name: Rampage Agents
summary: Rampage Agents is a VR game that fuses battle royale with multi-player action adventure games. Obtain powerful agents with unique powers and team up with your friends now!

name: Railroad Corporation: Competitive Spirit DLC
summary: This DLC is a set of different sandbox missions featured with AI competitors. A special interactive mode is available for a relaxed and interesting long-time play.

name: Rainbow Friends: Hide 'N Seek
summary: Zombie monsters are invading the town, spreading deadly infection everywhere they go. To survive the apocalypse, you must be ready to fight.

name: Raicing
summary: Mastermind the race in Raicing! Craft, train, and compete with AI drivers. Conquer rivals in thrilling multiplayer battles. Customize cars for the ultimate victory!

name: Rainbow Cream Saga
summary: Welcome to Rainbow Cream Saga, a kickass melee action survival game with some RPG vibes! You can craft weapons, build bases, capture mounts and much more! Come through on this epic adventure and test out your survival skills.

name: Ragdoll Combat
summary: 3D ragdoll fighting game with local multiplayer support with a growing number of characters and weapons to be added though various different updates. Powered by Unreal Engine 5

name: Rat it!
summary: Rat It is a single-player magic shooter game in VR. As the alchemist, you must wield your powerful slingshot eradicate all the evil monsters on a medieval sailing ship.

name: Rapidfire
summary: 6 Vanilla Compatible Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, for 6 days.

name: Rapidfire 2
summary: Another set of 6 Vanilla Compatible Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, for 6 days.

name: Rapidfire 3
summary: A Set of 6 Limit Removing Levels where the aim was to make One Map per day, during my time being quarantined at home.

name: Rail Gunner
summary:
Defend your train against the oncoming horde of AI controlled robots which run, fly, rocket and roll in pursuit.
Enemies are fully destructible and physically simulated (not animated) making for infinite variation in the carnage which you unleash.
Neural network control allows for a wide variety of enemies which attempt to maintain the chase even when their parts have been damaged and destroyed.
A variety of weapons and power-ups to unlock.
Game Center enabled with achievements to unlock and scores to share.

name: Rage of Towers
summary: Rage of Towers is a modern Realistic Tower defense game. Typically, you build towers on the path to destroy enemies before they reach the end, But what if you could take control of the tower by yourself and feel the battlefield.

name: Radio Flyer
summary: Radio Flyer is a cancelled flying game that was in development by Ocean in 1992 for the Super Nintendo. It seems that the project was based on the film with the same name from Columbia Pictures, in which 2 young brothers escape their chaotic family life with dreams of flying. Inspired by a local legend, they attempt to build a working airplane from their ordinary red wagon.

name: Rapz
summary: Rapz! is about a young girl, Rapulani, with a magical afro who must endure many great obstacles and a gauntlet of an adventure with her magical hair, just to get through the day. You must help Rapulani navigate her complicated 5 year old life and her wild hair as she tries to get through the day in order to make it to a friends’ birthday party. Good luck!

name: Rainbow
summary: Who are you. Where is this place. Find the secret in a rainbow-colored, monochrome world. Maybe this is all someone's dream.

name: Rainman
summary: When the rain falls, evil lurks. The storm is just the beginning. Can you survive the night and rescue your child from the clutches of Rainman? Prepare for the most intense survival horror.

name: Railgun 500
summary: Only five hundred remain. Eradicate them. Railgun 500 is a first person bunker shooter where you take your last stand against an invading force with nothing but your chargeable railgun. Use the weapon well. It's all you've got.

name: Race Manager
summary: Become a race manager

name: RainyDay
summary: Story The main character was taking shelter from the rain at a bus stop when it suddenly started to rain. Then a soaking wet woman appears to take shelter from the rain as well. While having a casual conversation, the two get closer to each other. And then...

name: Raioh
summary: Raioh is a retro style shot and bomb style vertical scroll shmup.

name: Rabbit's Fall
summary: It will be a journey from scratch where you'll need to tend to your farm with a lot of hard work while striving on a mission to reestablish the city's guild for gaining recognition and respect.

name: Rage Simulator
summary: Rage Simulator is a minimalist hand-drawn beat-em-up simulator. I made this little game for myself and for you guys, I just wanted to beat something up.

name: Rally Racing: Cars & Drift Mania
summary: Rev up your engines in Rally Racing.

name: Rasen Reijoh Spiral Ojosama: Chohatsu no Makina
summary: A "vertical roll, horizontal scroll" action game where you take control of Lady Makina, a young girl with martial arts and drill hair grappling powers, on a mission to rescue her father from haywire robots in a research facility.

name: Rayer Shoot
summary: Vertical scrolling shooter.

name: Rally Ar
summary: Argentinian Rally Simulator.

name: Rake Remastered
summary: Survive the pursuit of a monstrous predator in "Rake Remastered," a tribute to the 2015 original. Uncover mysteries armed with traps and cameras. Outsmart the Rake, survive the nightmare.

name: Railway Fugitive
summary: Railway Escape is a railway shooting light ROGUE game. The player plays a rebel warrior who escapes the pursuit of AI life enemies, fleeing along the railway line. Players need to upgrade different abilities and defeat all enemies in front of them.

name: Rainy Day Games
summary:
Rainy Day Games is 1 - 3 player series of 3 card games for children.

The player competes in card games against their opponent Ted Bear. There are three difficulty levels: beginner, smart, and genius. The three included games are: Concentration, where the player must memorize the location of a number of animated card, Old Maid, where the players choose matching cards from each other with the goal not to be the last holding the Joker, and Go Fish, where the players attempt to pick pairs from their opponent's hand.

name: Rawisland
summary: You have to go to a desert island and find hidden treasures. Crafting items and unique upgrades scattered throughout the island will help you survive.

name: Rabbitmaiden Softbook
summary: Rabbitmaiden Softbook is a companion visual novel to the mainline rabbitmaiden softworks vns (e.g. heartlovepowertemple)

name: Radio Silent
summary: You're a marine that just latched onto a ship that went radio silent for 10 years after entering a wormhole in space. Battle hoards of aliens, upgrade your arsenal, and collect audio logs to discover the chilling history of the ship you've boarded.

name: Rangers Club Football
summary:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: Racey Rocket
summary: Racey Rocket is a retro 2d arcade racing game where players boost, slide, and bounce their way around challenging tracks for the top time. Use ultra intuitive controls to guide a racing rocket through tight circuits and battle for the fastest times in the world.

name: Ravenous Horde
summary: Kill hordes of zombies as a hunter, and kill hunters when you're a zombie! In this round based multiplayer post-apocalyptic FPS you start as a hunter, and turn into a zombie when you die. Level up and unlock perks, new weapons and customization options!

name: Ravenwood Acres
summary: Ravenwood Acres is a relaxed fantasy reimaging of the farm sim genre. Write your own story in this vibrant frontier town; your life is at your fingertips. Will you train to become a legendary crafter, brave the wilderness as an adventurer, or live a quiet life on the farm?

name: Raging Blitz
summary: The war has come to an end and the victory has already been decided, but the futile battle still continues. The last mission was launched to leave as many survivors as possible. The pilot, Rei, and the mechanic, Ritsu, were on board their own machine (MMII), The two also attempted to leave the frontline for survival. The last mission is to survive.

name: Rangers Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Ratano
summary: Go on an adventure with Ratano, a little rat boy who has spent a lot of time doing science to impress his friends and teachers! But then something happens...

name: Random Acts of Madness
summary: Run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness, rushing along the sky trail to rescue the precious Royal Offspring held within each increasingly difficult lair. It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart, so react quickly to the onslaught of obstacles that block your path forward in Random Acts of Madness!

name: Raster
summary: Raster is a casual puzzle game about space. Here, you can use a variety of spatial abilities to traverse across diverse terrains, all in search of carrots for the bunny.

name: Race Drivin' a Go! Go!
summary: Race Drivin' a Go! Go! is an updated remake of the 1990 coin-op racing game of the same title. It features the original Hard Drivin' course, the courses added in the original Race Drivin', and three brand new courses only found in this new version. The number of available vehicles has also increased from 3 to 8. The game includes both a single-player championship mode and an arcade time attack mode.

name: Railway Islands 2
summary: Railway Islands 2 is a minimalist and relaxing puzzle game about designing a railway map for a large archipelago. Design a smooth journey for your trains as they transport people and vital resources between islands.

name: Rage Gang
summary: RAGE GANG is an engaging multiplayer co-op PvP game about the hard life of the Robbers and Policemen. Choose your side, team up with friends, and steal something or fight the Gangs!

name: Railway: Koko ni Aru Yume
summary:
A small port town with mountains on the back and the sea in the front. Main character returns to this town for the first time in 8 years after leaving it because of parents divorce.
Now grandmother invites him to help with the coffee shop "Railway" that got its name due to being set up at an abandoned train locomotive on the outskirts of the town.
Meeting old friends, recovering old memories... it's a place where dreams come true.

name: Ratking
summary: Become The Salary Man. Unleash ZA BLADE. Save Your Boss. Experience a life OFF ZA CLOCK. a Uniquely Surreal Action Combat, Player Choice Fueled, Point & Click Adventure.

name: Ravisod
summary: Mini-episode with two around medium-sized base levels and a start map. The map sources are included.

name: Railbreak
summary: Power through hordes of zombies, '90s arcade style, in this on-rails survival horror shooter.

name: Radial Ascension
summary: Fairly simple map set in a cave/cavern themed place designed for Torn's Doom Advent Calendar 2005 day 14.

name: Rain Wonder Trip
summary: Rain Wonder Trip is a quizz quizz/adventure game featuring Asias most popular RandB singer Rain. In the game, player goes on a trip with Rain and discovers everything there is to know about him and his life through multiple series of quizz and never seen before videos.

name: Rain Tactics
summary: Play Winter, an invincible god who desperately wants to die, in this cyberpunk RPG Tactics with roguelike elements. Explore the tower city of Shavanath, lead your avowed into battle and take control over your godly powers to change the course of Fate.

name: Razor Wire
summary: Take down zombies with a rope!

name: Raise the Flag
summary: Everyone wants to be a runner, but somebody has to raise the flag.

name: Rapid Roll
summary: Rapid Roll is kind of fall-down game with a lot of fun and challenges. Your mission is tilting the phone to move the ball between platforms without crashing into neither the top, the bottom nor the spikes

name: Rando'Knights
summary: Incremental mobile game centered around collecting 2D knight figurines.

name: Radio Cars
summary: Radio Controlled Car Challenge!

name: Rave Gazebo
summary: Rave Gazebo is a dance-interactive album. Flail your arms wildly and see the sound and environment respond to your gestures. Experience visuals impossible to see outside of VR! You are in control.

name: Raven Simulator
summary: Isn't that too complex living as a human being? Then live your life as a raven and enjoy as you can!

name: Rakugaki Mario
summary:
Rakugaki Mario is a love letter / pastiche / new(?!?!?!) romhack inspired by many hacks from the 2007-2009 era. What originally started as a semi in-joke between friends spiraled out into a much larger project, with a much larger author pool contributing levels (for better or worse). Making this hack semi-unique in nature is, in persuit of MAXIMUM AUTHENTICITY, all tools, sprites, blocks, and music (barring resources made specifically for the project) are from 2007-2009 too. That's right, we're talking Lunar Magic 1.63, JonWill's Blktool, MikeyK's Sprite Tool 1.22, and Romi's Addmusic 4.04. Of course, this wouldn't be playable on hardware by default. To comply with SMWC standards, only the fixed version is available below (in both Japanese and English). It contains the usual modern hack fixes (FastROM, QoL adjustments, Blktool Optimizer, ect), but that doesn't mean it's any less difficult! For SNESGT and ZSNES enthusiasts, you can also play the original unfixed (Japanese) version through this handy link right here. One may be quick to compare this to one of my previous hacking endeavors, but this is a very stylistically different hack that goes in a different direction. If you were a fan of that hack, you may not be particularly pleased that it isn't a continuation / sequel, but I did try to throw a bone in a level or two. Regardless, I still expect this hack to be very difficult. An Author List for individual levels can be found here. Be mindful of spoilers!

Difficulty curve is practically nonexistent, and levels explore various design styles, so you'll never know what's next. Whilst tagged as a Kaizo hack, take solace in the knowledge that this is primarily a Standard: Very (Very) Hard hack. However, because certain levels are played in a style and way agreed upon today to be "Kaizo" (one hit kill, levels played in a strict way, and lots of trial and error), I felt it was a necessity to tag it as such for the unwitting moderator or player who wishes to tackle such a hack.

name: Rage of Mages
summary: This mobile Allods game is an absorbing step-by-step RPG in a wonderful fantasy setting revealing the prehistory of the world of Allods. Two levels of hero's research — a land map and a labyrinth of underground— give the character alternative possibilities of missions implementation.

name: Radiant Victorias
summary: With kindom Asira left in ruins, Wolf, the prince of Asira, embarks on a journey around the world where he teams up with eight heroines and tries to stop the empire's ambition.

name: Radish Field
summary: Find the correct path to move across the entire field without getting stuck.

name: Rauol
summary: It's a story about a thief, "Rauol," who hides in a secret warehouse of a large company to make a big deal, unexpectedly becomes a combination with Duoksini, who is being tested in captivity and runs away.

name: Rally Race: Offroad Simulator
summary: The thrill of victory awaits! Conquer challenging tracks, become a rally legend!

name: Radiant Bricks
summary: Classic brick breaker with a twist. Change the color of the paddles to change which bricks you can hit. Part action, part puzzle.

name: Rank Boss Bullets
summary: A vertical bullet hell game. Preview and select between three randomly generated options to choose the boss and every add-on you're going to face, then start a time-based survival trial. Difficulty can be scaled infinitely here, and your limit will be tested.

name: Rated Sudoku
summary: Everything you ever want in a Sudoku game! You can play Sudoku, analyze puzzles, edit puzzles, generate puzzles, there are campaigns (lessons) and you can even paint Sudoku images!

name: Rabbit Hole
summary: Rabbit Hole is an upcoming story-driven - RPG filled with psychological cosmic horrors and then then tightly wrapped in the wackiness of Alice in Wonderland.

name: Ragnarock: Jonathan Young Raid
summary: The Jonathan Young Raid DLC is the latest major update to the 2021 rhythm game. It follows June's Sabaton Raid which added six new tracks from the Swedish band like Seven Pillars of Wisdom and Night Witches.

name: Rainbow Fish and the Whale
summary: Based on Marcus Pfister's children's book 'Rainbow Fish and the Whale'. An interactive underwater adventure where you can talk and play games with sea creatures.

name: Rail Romanesque Origin
summary: Rail Romanesque Origin is a console port of the romance visual novel Maitetsu: Last Run!!. The original game was released for PC in Japan on October 30, 2020.

name: Rat Trap
summary: Swap, fuse and split to escape! A fast paced, hand-drawn metroidvania adventure based on multiple unique characters that you can fuse together or split apart at will. Use these powers to explore a mysterious facility, solve puzzles and beat the bad guys! Can you escape the Rat Trap?

name: Ragnarock: Jonathan Young - "Eye of the Storm"
summary: Includes the song for Ragnarock:Jonathan Young - Eye of the StormAlso includes a new boat.

name: Ragnarock: Jonathan Young, Galactikraken - "Man the Cannons"
summary: Includes the song for Ragnarock:Jonathan Young & Galactikraken - Man the CannonsAlso includes a new boat.

summary: Includes the song for Ragnarock:Jonathan Young & Galactikraken - Storm the CastleAlso includes a new boat.

name: Ragnarock: Jonathan Young - "Loose Cannon"
summary: Includes the song for Ragnarock:Jonathan Young - Loose CannonAlso includes a new boat.

name: Ragnarock: Jonathan Young - "Randy Dandy Oh"
summary: Includes the song for Ragnarock:Jonathan Young - Randy Dandy OhAlso includes a new boat.

name: Ragnarock: Jonathan Young - "Santiana"
summary: Includes the song for Ragnarock:Jonathan Young - SantianaAlso includes a new boat.

name: Railway Empire 2: Journey To The East
summary: In Railway Empire 2 – Journey to the East you’ll embark on a mission that promises unimaginable riches. Starting in Vienna, your enterprise will take you through the Carpathians and the Balkans, before finally reaching the legendary city of Constantinople.

name: Raven Go!
summary:
Beast boy finds a little alone time, but he got a little too comfortable when Raven walked in.

This is a very short visual novel featuring Raven and Beast boy from Teen Titans.

name: Rakuen Hakai
summary:
The Kaneiki brothers, a pair of brothers with supernatural abilities, used their powers to steal treasure after treasure until they were captured at last. Their sentence was to be exiled to a place that only espers could enter, commonly known as Paradise.
Will the brothers really be able to return home?
And what is the truth about Paradise?

name: Rainbow Fish and the Amazing Lagoon
summary:
Rainbow Fish and the Amazing Lagoon is an interactive story based on characters created by the children's book author and illustrator, Marcus Pfister, for his picture book about the colorful fish, and on the television series stemming from the book.
An interactive underwater adventure where you can talk and play games with sea creatures.

name: Raising the Bar: Salvation
summary: Salvation sees the player take control of Grigori immediately after bidding Gordon farewell following the quarry holdout. Whilst his journey continues forwards, Grigori must now work backwards in an effort to not only leave Ravenholm behind, but cleanse it such that no parasites remain. You'll tread familiar ground made unfamiliar by the effects of Gordon's path through the town, combined with the riled-up zombie hordes out in full force, and new pathways Grigori will take to complete his exodus. Pyres will deliver some of Grigori's once-friends to a better place, and also play their part in igniting a flame that will sweep through Ravenholm. By the time you've reached the end of the mod, the entire town will be up in flames and scorched by your actions.

name: Rage: Anger Management
summary: The Realm of Rage was a secret place, hidden from the eyes of mortals and gods alike. It was created by an ancient wizard, whose name was lost to time, as a sanctuary for himself and his fellow adventures. There, they could unleash their anger and frustration on anything they desired, without fear of consequences or death.

name: Rat Wars Survivors
summary: Rat Wars Survivors was released by industrial noise band Health to promote their sixth album, Rat Wars. It is an homage to Vampire Survivors.

name: Ratatouille
summary: Nintendo DS port of Ratatouille.

name: Ratatouille
summary: PlayStation Portable port of Ratatouille.

name: Ratatouille
summary: Java Mobile port of Ratatouille.

name: Radar Zone
summary: Encircle the rectangles in order to gain the points displayed in its middle but beware of the sparks which also run on the edges of the rectangles.

name: Rally Bike
summary: Rally Bike is a bird's eye viewed motorcycle road racing game, where the player controls a motorcycle and must cross the finish line before an established number of competitor bikes. Fuel is a major obstacle, as running out of it results in game over. Any accident will cause great reduction of fuel, and stopping to refuel will cause competitor bikes to take advantage. Competitors never run out of fuel.

name: Racer
summary: An unreleased racing game for the Atari 2600, developed by Roklan.

name: Radar
summary: Radar is an Action game, published by Zellers, which was released in 1983. Released by Sancho in Europe as Exocet.

name: Rampage
summary: George, Lizzy and Ralph were just ordinary Americans, until an experiment went wrong, turning them into a Gorilla, Lizard and Werewolf respectively. Following this, the three of them plan to go round destroying buildings, and up to 3 human players can join in. Smashing at the edges of the buildings for long enough will make them collapse. The police and military are after you, and will shoot at you, so try to destroy them (failing that, you can avoid the bullets). You will need to eat regularly, with things like plants on offer, to avoid shrinking back to being human

name: Rally Cross
summary: A port of Rally Cross, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Ranch Battle
summary: Ranch Battle is a top-down arena shooting light ROGUE game where players take on the role of a character who simultaneously uses four weapons to repel swarms of aliens. Choose from various features and props until rescue arrives.

name: Railway Empire: Nintendo Switch Starter Bundle
Radical Fishing
summary:
Radical Fishing is an Adobe Flash-based game where a fisherman sits in a boat and casts his line into the water, pulls up fish into the air, and shoots them with a gun.

Vlambeer sold the Flash game to a browser games website in 2010 but kept the rights to produce a sequel for iOS, which they called Ridiculous Fishing.

name: Rayman
summary: A Sega 32x version of the very first Rayman game which never came to be.

name: Ramen no Megami
summary: A PC and mobile game where you manage a ramen restaurant.

name: Rainbow Brite: Journey to Rainbow Land
Raiden IV x Mikado Remix: Special Edition
summary:
The Special Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- 2-disc set of the original soundtrack
- Custom Sleeve

name: Railbreak: The Big Break Collection
summary: Run! Zombies and dinos are everywhere! Wait, is that a ghost?!

name: Railbreak: Dinoblast Collection
summary: On-rails zombie shooter and a retro survival horror nightmare? I'm in!

name: Railbreak: Extra Cheese Collection
summary: Dinos and zombies await in three terrifying adventures!

name: Rapid Soccer
summary: The first truly physics-based football (soccer) game with highly intelligent AI opponents. Jump into career mode and guide your favorite club or country to cup glory! Play with up to 8 friends in local multiplayer or challenge other people from all over the world in online tournaments!

name: Racing Go
summary: Racing Go is a car game where you have to use your driving skills on exciting tracks! In the game you will find a lot of different tracks and several types of cars! Overcome unusual obstacles, maneuver, and get to the finish line within a certain time!

name: Raldi's Crackhouse
summary:
One of the Baldi's Basics mods ever made.
Can you escape Raldi's Crackhouse?
Run around the school, and collect 10 notebooks before Raldi can catch you..
Discover fan favorites such as Chipfloke, Pinto Beans, Van Man, MrBeast, and of course, Raldi himself!
Can you outsmart Raldi and the other characters and uncover all of the hidden secrets of the crackhouse?

name: Raven Fighter
summary: Raven Fighter is a classic shoot‘em and roguelite game where players can customize their favorite weapons to defeat the final boss. Different weapon combinations result in varied outputs, accompanied by rich visual effects for an enhanced gaming experience.

name: Rainbow fighter
summary: This is a fast-paced flying shooting game.

name: Ragdoll Wreckage: Zombie Farts
summary: Side-scrolling game where you employ both your flatulence and structures around you to collect points for victory!

name: Rabbit and Turtle
summary: A 3D action game where you control a turtle, use magic and items on the field, and aim to reach the goal before the rabbit does.

name: Rasmus Klump: og hans Venner Leger og Lærer
Raiders of Treasure Island
summary: This is a multiplayer action-competitive game where you use mystical powers to become the ruler of the world! Warriors, gunmen, wizards... Dig up treasures buried deep underground. If you can make it out alive, they will all be yours. Gather your friends and join together in a hunting team.

name: Rary
summary: Rary - is a casual game in which you play as a bird and the main task is to eat fruits that fall on the playing field and earn points with this. Do not eat mushrooms, monitor the amount of fruit. And how many points can you earn?

name: Rain Runner
summary: Rain Runner is a short, blood-pumping speedrunning FPS where you ditch your keyboard and only use your mouse! You'll run constantly where you look, shoot targets and dash through challenging platforms. No checkpoints, no pauses: beat it in one sitting! Run, die, learn, repeat. Be better, be faster.

name: Rainbow Moon + Rainbow Skies Strategy RPG Bundle
summary: Over 100 hours of Strategy RPG glory!

name: RaceTrap
summary: RaceTrap pits a team of drivers against a pantheon of racing gods. Play cards to sabotage the track the drivers are racing on as a god. As a driver, complete 3 laps with your life intact!

name: Raid on Bungeling Bay
summary: Raid on Bungeling Bay has the player controlling a helicopter which is on a mission to destroy everything that moves. The only ally is the carrier, which is where the player begins at each level and may return to for repair and pick up bombs, as long as the player manages to protect it from being destroyed. The main goal in each level is to destroy a factory, which requires a steady increasing amount of bombs. Enemy forces include ships, planes, tanks, anti-air guns, and eventually, a large battleship.

name: Radikal Bikers
summary: A cancelled Game Boy Color port of Radikal Bikers.

name: Ravensburger Kinderwelt
summary: An online game for children aged 6-10 created by Ravensburger. Users can choose a character model and a place to live, can change their clothes and hairstyle, furniture their home, play games, and more.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Premature Release
summary: A vertical slice of an unofficial and unfinished PS2 era-styled Ratchet and Clank fangame that will likely never reach completion.

name: Rat Race
summary: Engage in a top-down rhythm puzzle game with a built-in level editor. Unravel the Rat Race mystery, find freedom, and save your fellow test subjects. Evade blasts, lasers, and fallen test subjects. Create, and share unfair level designs with your friends through steam.

name: Rayman Origins
summary: Whilst mainly the same as the other versions of Rayman Origins, the PlayStation Vita version adds in something in the form of Relics.

name: Rama's Quest
summary: Embark on a legendary journey in "Rama's Quest," a captivating rogue-lite bullet hell rooted in the rich tapestry of Indian mythology.

name: Rainbow Six: SMOL
summary: Rainbow Six: SMOL is a top-down rogue-lite mobile game that takes players to the cute version of Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six universe. As players progress through fast-paced, procedurally-generated missions filled with destructible environments, smart enemies, terrible traps and challenging objectives, they will free territories, reap benefits and recruit new Operators and Recruits to their cause.

name: Rail Rampage
summary:
As someone of skill, working in a dangerous but high-level position, it's no wonder why you're up to the task. Unfortunately, we can't always expect luck to be on our side. Fight through a train, prison, and your own employers to finally take back your title of being a 'high value asset'. Features several levels, a built in level editor and player and more.

After all, your skills are worth a lifetime.

name: Raid on Tri City: Second Wave
summary:
Raid on Tri City: Second Wave is an action puzzle title that mixes falling block gameplay with shooting. It is a physical release and an expanded version of the original "Raid on TriCity" that was download only.

The player controls a space ship on a playfield similar to the one of Tetris. The ship can freely be moved around the area as long as its part of a stacked block. New Tetrominoes drop down from the top of the screen. They cannot be moved or rotated, but they can be shot brick by brick. Scoring is done by creating lines, so careful shooting is required to either destroy the block completely or to make parts fit the gaps in the playfield to stack them properly and create lines. The shooting itself does not affect the score. Some of the falling blocks contain power-ups or enemies that can be destroyed or drop to add to the stack. Power-ups such as bombs can become dangerous when lines are formed and enemies restrict movement when part of the stack and can then only be taken out through lines. When the blocks reach a threshold near the top of the screen, the game is over.

EEPROM on the cartridge is used to save the game and store highscores. Also new to this release is the Story mode. It splits the gameplay into separate levels with a fixed goal to complete them, a narrative about aliens where the player has to save Congis Space Station and the AC2-K11 sector of the Galaxy, and some interactivity with a branching level path. The gameplay for Story is similar to the Arcade mode but there the only goal is to beat the highscore.

The playfield only takes up about 50% of the screen in the center. On the left there is a picture showing a control element of a space ship and the right part contains the HUD elements. In the Story mode the HUD shows the remaining time, the level objective such as the number of lines, bombs and bugs, and the number of bullets you can shoot at the same time. In the Arcade mode the HUD shows the score, the number of lines, the current level and the number of bullets you can shoot at the same time.

name: Ramshackle.Exe
summary: RAMSHACKLE.EXE is a 3D platformer about a broken repair robot trying to save his mechanical home from a destructive VIRUS. Find and repair viruses to fix the world. Just be careful, your efforts will restore ALL functions, both critical and dangerous.

name: Rabbit Hole
summary: Rabbit Hole is a fast paced, tough-as-nails 2D RogueLike-Shooter, made with love for the genre. You are Disc, someone who was suddenly brought to the Rabbit Hole. Collect guns, fight foes and meet strange new characters on your descent to the bottom, all in an attempt to find your heart again.

name: Rage Quit Bundle
summary: Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends Get ready to feel the pain! Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends is a punishing platforming game where you start in the deepest depths of Hell and must escape.

name: Race Against a Duck: Duck Deluxe
summary: "Water... Land... Sky... Do you have what it takes to defeat nature's All Terrain Vehicle?" Upgraded with new modes, improvements, and story content from the original web version!

name: Raymundo Aventuras: The Definitive Edition
summary: oh no! the bad guys did nothing wrong! you gotta kill them!, and fast

name: Radagon Boss FIght
summary: This community mod adds Elden Ring's boss Radagon in Sekiro: Shadow Die Twice.

name: RADS: The Radioactive Apocalypse Dating Simulator
summary: A post-apocalyptic visual novel with choices and multiple endings. After being accidentally frozen in an Ice Cream Parlour freezer, our college-party-planning hero wakes decades later in a post-apocalyptic world of mutants, robots and monsters... determined to host a party and get a date!

name: Ragmonton Endless For Save Indie Game
summary: Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike up to 4 players with Endless action to survive > Get items and discover powerful transformations to increase your power to survive the invading alien horde and save indie games.

name: Randy & Manilla
summary:
Randy & Manilla is a game in which we discover a mysterious quantum cyber-universe hosted by Net-Cubes that contain virtual worlds with several game genres.

In gameplay terms, Each Net-Cube is a world, which contains levels that represent each video game genre. For example, Terra-Qubit has levels based on the platform games, Gamezone Cube on classic arcades, or Rol & Rogue on rogue-lite and RPGs.

name: Raver Simulator
summary: Find a place for yourself in the magical world of rave music. Try to achieve your goal of becoming the best raver by fighting the symptoms of addiction.

name: Ravva and the Netherworld Train
summary: Embark on the Netherworld Train with Ravva! Behold a new power to fuse with each of their companions, and explore the dangers of the land of the dead! A cute pixel-art platformer adventure awaits you!

name: Radioquacktive
summary: Have you ever wondered how a duck would survive a Nuclear Apocalypse? If you want to survive the flooded wastelands, you will need to quack enemies down, scavenge supplies, and mutate to adapt to the ever-increasing monstrosities that you will encounter.

name: Rabbitra 2
summary: Combined horizontal shooting and endless runner, "Clean" the enemies with "traditional" gameplay style. Try to buy items to help you "clean" more enemies and challenge for higher scores.

name: Race Elcano
summary: The new car is not electric, nor is it a flying car. The new car is a one-button driving car. Control the direction and speed of the car simultaneously with a single button. To turn you also accelerate and to accelerate you also turn, difficult to master but intuitive.

name: Raver's Rumble
summary: What seems like a normal Tuesday in the life of Myk Raver.

name: Ranocta
summary: Ranocta is a note-drop 2D rhythm game in a space that crosses straight and circular shapes. In an emotional and beautiful world full of colors and sounds, experience your own performance to recover lost light.

name: Railpunk Mayhem
summary: All aboard! Enjoy a unique, fast-paced roguelike action experience. In Railpunk Mayhem, survive relentless waves of enemies at breakneck speeds, build a powerful train to manage your crew, and strategically plan your route to the source of chaos.

name: Rasvyat Nuclear Power Station
summary: Rasvyat Nuclear Power Station is a physics-based nuclear reactor simulation where players operate and maintain a functioning power plant. Using realistic calculations, players must keep the reactor stable while responding to various emergencies including system failures and power outages. Every operator decision has long-term consequences, with mistakes potentially leading to reactor trips, equipment damage, or catastrophic meltdowns.

name: Random Legion
summary: This is a casual and strategy attributes of self-movement game. Players will take on the role of the leader, expanding the team, learning talents and skills, strengthening equipment, transforming soldiers and other ways to combat power, breaking through random levels, and ultimately to win the game.

name: Rabbit Rampage
summary: Dive into Rabbit Rampage, a whimsical game where rabbit Max is accidentally transformed into a Plush Bunny Cyborg by eccentric scientist Lazar. Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm as Max embarks on an epic adventure, equipped with high-tech gadgets and cybernetic enhancements

name: Rattenkönig
summary: Rattenkönig is a Brazilian folklore inspired cosmic horror adventure where you take a boat trip through the mangroves of Brazil in search of a fabled rat temple.

name: Radiant Exodus
summary:
Sarah Caldwell's casual drink at a neon-lit bar turns into a night of survival.

As mutants descend from a UFO above Gleam City,
Grab your AK47 and fight back in this adrenaline-pumping first-person shooter.

name: Randomice
summary:
A procedural Metroid-like with no fights, focused on exploration and route-planning, in which you play a mouse trying to escape from an ever-changing house.

Each run is a compact Metroid-like experience, in which you will find upgrades to explore the house differently each time. From a magnetic grapple to reach a metallic faucet, to a rideable rocket that can burst through the glass blocking the way, you will find many upgrades, each with its own uses.

You must adapt to the tools in your possession to determine where you can go, the thrill of the game coming both from the platforming mastery, but also from the mental mapping of where you can go in the house at any given time. When you obtain a new item, you need to update this mental map to determine the best possibilities, optimize your path, and decide where to go next to maximize the chances to exit quickly.

The ability to follow an efficient path is important during races, in which all the competing players will have the same game configuration and must exit the house as fast as they can. But the game is also designed to be enjoyed solo and slowly, thanks to a single-player progression that lets each player discover the challenges at their own pace.

name: Rankdle
summary:
Rankdle is an interactive game for content creators to react to their viewer submissions!
Players challenge themselves to rank things and go head-to-head with the content creator.

name: Ray: Part 1
summary: Play as Ray, a mercenary, in this fully voiced updated remake of the 2003 Newgrounds classic. Your decisions have real impact in an enhanced narrative with improved graphics.

name: Rainbow Mosaics 12: Easter Helper
summary: A nonogram game with puzzles themed around the easter bunny & eggs.

name: Rainbow Mosaics: Christmas Lights
summary: A festive nonogram game with 100 puzzles to solve.

name: Rainbow Mosaics: Blooming Garden
summary: This is a nonogram game with 120 puzzles to solve.

name: Rainbow Cotton
summary:
Dive right into this 3D rail shooter as the young witch Cotton, accompanied by her trusty fairy friend, Silk. Lured by the promise of delicious Willow, help Cotton confront the wicked demon, Tweed, and his legions of followers who have stolen the Legendary Willow from the enchanting land of York Country. Hop on your broomstick and go to town in this wacky adventure!

Rainbow Cotton features exciting gameplay reminiscent of its predecessor, the classic game Panorama Cotton. The game takes you on an arcade-inspired journey through a fantastic world full of surprises and challenges. Every stage in Rainbow Cotton is guarded by peculiar bosses that puts your skills to the test. Collect power-ups, build up your flashy projectiles, and hurl them at colorful enemies. Use powerful magic attacks to clear the screen with fireballs and lightning. Only the most courageous (or stubborn, Willow-obsessed!) witches will prevail!

The charming 3D graphics will leave you mesmerized as you travel through, for example, a cozy moonlit town draped in Christmas lights, a mysterious sunken forest, and a magical castle above the clouds!

name: Railroad Scheduler
