summary: A train adventure where you avoid collisions and complete each level in the fastest time possible. With the ability to control time, you'll have the power to determine the game's speed and even go back in time to fix any mistakes and optimize the travel time for every train.

name: Rap Quest
summary: Rap Quest started life as Rap City, a game starring the one and only Vanilla Ice, who was later on replaced with "Cool Q" due to his waning popularity. The game was finished and sent in to Nintendo for approval, but was never released.

name: Racing Stars
summary: Fasten your seat belts and buckle up for a turbo-charged adventure in this zany cartoon car racing game - Rasing Stars !!!

name: Rager
summary: Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-fueled excitement of this melee combat rhythm game! Master weapon of your choice – sword, mace, claws, hammer, axe, your own fists and many more! Stunning visuals and spatial audio technology puts you right in heart of the action.

name: Rat Hotel
summary: You have to watch out for Waldo, thr rat catcher, while you roam the hotel for some cheese.

name: Ramen Oil Simulator
summary: Use the mouse to drag and move the oil droplets, aiming to gather the floating oil into a cluster.

name: Rage of the Dragons NEO
summary: Engage in intense tag team battles in Rage of the Dragons NEO! Play the cult-classic among the fans of Fighting Games with brand-exclusive content!

name: Raey
summary: Embark on the journey and watch Raey's eventful life unfold before your eyes. From the cradle to the grave - Raey will take the player through a roller coaster of emotions as he endures everything that is thrown at him.

name: Railway Life
summary: Travel the forgotten railways on your little steam train in this charming slice-of-life adventure game, where you explore the fields, towns, mountains and beaches of a small British island and help turn it into a thriving community.

name: Rally One: Race to Glory
summary:
Accept the challenge of rally apocalypse!

Rally One is a full-featured racing game for mobile gamers. It features an easy-to-understand interface, a physics system improved based on user feedback, and well-optimized graphics.

In Rally One, you can participate in championships with powerful cars in exotic locations, race against people from around the world, and test your speed, maneuverability, and drift skills in special events.

name: RangBi
summary: RangBi is a rogue-lite autobattler with emphasis on team composition and strategy. Navigate the fragmented hells for a shot at redemption. You must avoid succumbing to the abyss.

name: Rain World: The Watcher
summary: Rain World: The Watcher is an expansion of Rain World. Journey beyond to something, somewhere only ever glimpsed. When the world beneath your feet cracks and crumbles, will you hold on to all you once new? Or dive into the unknown?

name: Ranch Mayhem
summary: Ranch Mayhem is an active idle game. Explore 15 crops, face invasions, and spend them for bonuses. Enjoy the changing seasons and the farming adventure at your own pace.

name: Ravenwood Academy: A Wizard101 Story
summary: Step into the role of an outcast student wizard attending Ravenwood Academy and prepare to discover the truth behind the school’s bizarre events. Create connections, investigate mysteries, and drop in for a spell in this storybook-style life sim where your choices matter.

name: Rapid Fury
summary: In Rapid Fury (FPS) you blast the monsters and bosses with a shotgun across four arenas. Choose 20 waves of monsters or endless wave. Level up your skills after each wave. Electronic music helps you maintain your firing rhythm. Master the game and climb the leaderboard to the top. Have a blast!

name: Raidborn: Founder's Pack
summary: The RAIDBORN Founder's Pack offers a collection of rare and exclusive bonus content, typically reserved for special occasions. With 60 legendary items and more than 20 new enchantments introduced to the game, this pack has you covered for all your raiding needs.

name: Radiosol
summary: RADIOSOL is a journey through a desolate world burned by a planetary cataclysm. In search of answers, you will have to navigate through the ruins of megastructures and abandoned cities, avoiding the scorching rays of the Sun.

name: Ray
summary: Dive into the immersive depths of RAY, an eerie dystopian deep-sea adventure. Locate hidden items to witfully solve physics based puzzles. Navigate the abandoned station with stealth as vicious predators roam the abyss. If spotted; Hide!

name: Rara Magic
summary:
Raramagi is a mobile action RPG game where players can battle against monsters with cute school girls. By proceeding further into the story, players can develop stronger bonds with the girls. The game's animation is produced by A-1 pictures with Live2D technology and all girls are voiced over by famous CVs. Enjoy your school life with lively cute girls together!

The main storyline is fully voiced, with Live2D animation and anime-style stills of the heroines. The main story is divided into one act per heroine, and by the end of the service, the 14th act had been distributed. The heroines can be interacted with on the home screen, and interaction elements such as the "Outing" function, which allows users to take pictures with the heroines using an AR camera, and to increase their "Kizuna Lv" by giving them gifts.

The project was announced at the Nico Nico Ultra Conference 2015 on April 25, 2015. It then underwent a closed beta test conducted from October 20 to October 26, 2016 and was released as an iOS/Android game app on January 25, 2017. The pre-registration that began on December 22, 2016, attracted over 150,000 people, and after distribution, the game received 1 million downloads on March 9, 2017, and one year later, on March 9, 2018, it surpassed 2 million downloads.

The end of the service was announced on April 3, 2020, and the service was terminated on June 3 of the same year.

name: Raid the Dungeon
summary: Raid the Dungeon is an easy tapping clicker RPG game with a backgroud of exotic fantasy world and an epic adventure.

name: RamsaySnap
summary: A game about shooting characters for points but you need to avoid killing the wrong people. Instead of SnapShot characters you will be aiming real people but avoid the SnapShot characters at all costs.

name: RageBall
summary: RageBall is modern take on a classic game retro style game. A dynamic arcade game with fast paced gameplay and engaging mechanics. RageBall is a 2d animation sports game, that pits player against player. Can you overcome the Rage?

name: Rai-Net Access Battlers
summary: Board game based on the fictional Steins;gate universe game of the same name.

name: Raccoon Out
summary: Tired of getting you food stolen by raccoons? No more! In this cozy and wholesome game, you can defend yourself against those raccoons.

name: Radical Race
summary: And endless scrolling hover bike escape race (on Planet Mars).

name: Rail Maze 2
summary: Navigate 100+ original puzzles, build railroads, and outsmart PIRATE foes on rails. Create your levels with the Level Editor and solve limitless challenges created by other players. Unleash creativity and conquer the rails in this thrilling puzzle adventure!

name: RadioWave
summary: Welcome to RadioWorld! An amazing attraction filled with robotics with the latest artificial intelligence and robust systems put in place for all ages to come and enjoy... or at least that's what RadioWorld was before the incident. RadioWave is always watching. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Rakeo
summary: Rakeo is a precision platformer about collecting cookies! Find secrets, face bosses, and collect lots of cookies!

name: Rail Route: Happy Passengers
summary: This expansion focuses on the art of keeping passengers happy in your rail network. Introducing a completely new angle of gameplay, adding passenger demands in your cycles.

name: Rainbow Diamonds
summary: Travel the galaxy in this pixelated 2D adventure

name: Rapsodie
summary:
RAPSODIE is a strategic card game that allows you to create your own rap music label with a deck based on your favorite artists.

Sign your favorite artists, discover the talents of tomorrow, face off against other players in very short and wild duels !

name: Rat Quest
summary: In this platformer, jumping will be your main mechanic as you climb the level, each jump matters, if you miss a jump, you have to restart. You may be small but so are the platforms.

name: Raid Run
summary: Raid Run is a game inspired by fake mobile game ads. Your character automatically travels through the level where you must face increasingly difficult enemies, grabbing power ups and evolving your skills along the way. Attacks and skills are fired automatically. Conquer 3 levels with 3 difficulties.

name: Rastignac: Wastelands
summary:
Rastignac Wastelands is a survival shooter set in a vast, procedural open world where every decision matters.
Play as a wanderer in a desolate wasteland, scavenging resources, crafting weapons, and fighting to survive against hostile creatures and rival survivors.

The world of Rastignac evolves with each run — no two journeys are the same. Explore abandoned ruins, hunt for rare loot, and adapt your strategy to the dangers of the wastelands.
With its blend of exploration, survival mechanics, and fast-paced combat, Rastignac Wastelands challenges you to endure in a hostile, ever-changing environment.

name: Rana Neida
summary: Figure out why Winter is angry and save Spring in Rana Neida. A Cute metroidvania platformer where you play as the aspect of Spring.

name: Rap Pop Jump Core
summary: Rap Pop Jump Core is a hardcore action platformer demanding constant movement, quick decisions, and combat. Navigate a vibrant city by leaping between platforms. One mistake, and you fall to your fate. Escape swiftly!

name: Rags to Liches
summary: A small, third-person, action, tower defense game where you play as a peasant who gets tired of adventurers breaking into his house. Place down towers and fight off waves and waves of "enemies." Progress through the story and see just how far one man will go to protect his beloved llama.

name: Random Hero Defense
summary: Block enemies with randomly generated heroes Survive until the last round and clear the game. Defeat enemies and use the gold you earn to produce more heroes and become stronger.

name: Ranger Force
summary: Ranger Force is an atmospheric third person, action, adventure, shooter, and fighting game that can be experienced alone, or with a partner in multiplayer split-screen mode.

name: Rapture Recovery Squad
summary: Rapture Recovery Squad is a dungeon crawling, deck building auto-battler. Map out the depths beneath humanity's last refuge and build up your roster of psionically charged fighters to prevent the end of the world.

name: Rainbow Valley
summary: After getting lost in a blizzard you find yourself in Rainbow Valley—a strange mountain with even stranger villagers.

name: Rainbow Fish Goes to College
summary: The Player plays the titular character: Rainbow Fish! Yes, from the children's book. Except he's all grown up and is ready to take on his first day of school. Help him survive while also peering into the life of a fish who wants to be more than the book he's known for

name: Raining City: Millions Recollections
summary: One night, Luxuan woke up soaked in blood, a mysterious black hole in the palm of her hand – and millions pouring out of that hole, like an unstoppable fountain of wealth. Still in shock, Luxuan has to evade the monsters that rushed to her and her new riches. A strange story begins in a gloomy city…

name: Rainbow Ascend: Anime Girls Go Up
summary: Game where you guide anime-style girls through a thrilling free-running adventure.

name: Ragnarok Age of Heroes
summary: Ragnarok has struck, the gods have fallen, and Yggdrasil has collapsed. As one of the surviving humans in the last refuge, you face harsh environments and threats from other races. Bereft of technology and divine protection, humans must rely on their own strength to rise in this new era of heroes.

name: Ragdoll Mayhem Maker
summary: I love ragdolls and I love physics, so I thought I would mush the two together with a level editor and make a cool sandbox game for people to play around in. Currently, there is a very basic JSON-based level editor and 20 pre-built levels.

name: Ravage
summary: Ravage immerses you in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Survive by battling hunger, thirst, and enemies. Build and fortify bases, raid for resources, engage in intense PvP, and join clans. Experience immersive realism. Are you ready to face the challenge?

name: Raccooneering
summary:
Build. Flail around wildly. Rebuild. Help Björn the raccoon build the ultimate escape vehicle out of garbage.

*Raccooneering* was made in 5 days in Jaunpils Castle for Castle Game Jam 2023.

name: Raid on Tri City
summary:
Raid on Tricity is an Atari Lynx ROM intended to be played on real Lynx via a flashcard or on an emulator on other devices.

The game come in 2 versions :

"Second Wave" is for sale on Yastuna Games store, and add a Story mode to the Arcade experience. It is now also available as free download.

"First Contact" is only digital and free on itch.io, feature only Arcade mode

What's new in Raid on TriCity - First Impact, compared to the previous version:
- Game is more punchy now,
- Bombs explode when they hit the ground, so be careful,
- Leaderboard

name: Radikal Fighters
summary:
Radikal Fighters is an exciting action game with vibrant, cartoonish visuals, that offers two thrilling game modes:

Battle Royale: Dive into a chaotic free-for-all where only the last fighter standing wins. Explore the vibrant streets of Radikal City, filled with surprises and hazards. Use your unique perks, weapons, and gear to outsmart and outfight other players in fast-paced, intense battles.

Paint Rush: Engage in an exhilarating team-based mode where three teams compete to dominate the arena by coloring as many dots as possible in their team's colors. Collaborate with your teammates, strategize to cover the most ground, and thwart your opponents' efforts in this fast-paced, color-splattered frenzy.

Get ready to jump into the action and prove your skills in the absurd world of Radikal Fighters!

name: Raider's Saga
summary:
Raiders Saga is the ultimate gaming experience of 2024, where chaos and beauty collide in a Cybernetic Anime Themed Viking Saga.
Engage in Seasonal Matchmaking to delve into the realms of PvP, PvE, and Raider Racing! Battle it out in PvP Arena Deathmatches and intense PvP Capture the Flag modes, showcasing your skills like never before.

Feel the itch for speed?
Join our Matchmaking Racing Odin’s Cup to satisfy your racing desires!

But wait, there's more!
Embark on epic adventures with friends through our PvE Matchmaking, conquering Dungeons and Raids as you strive to become the next(esports) legend.

Join Raiders Saga today and immerse yourself in a world where legends are born and epic tales unfold!

name: Rarity
summary:
slowly reassemble the new landscapes

Short little 3D, first person narrative game about life continuing after COVID and the weird time skip that occurred for people as their lives drastically changed in an ephemeral but 3 year time period.

Explores themes around University, friendships, the feeling of time passing and it being over before it's begun.

name: Race Drivin'
summary:
SNES Port of "Race Drivin'"

Here it is... the amazing conversion of the smash arcade sensation brings screaming-fast car racing to your home! Pound the pedal and grind those gears, down the straights and around wicked hairpin turns. Whip through hairy S-curves, gut-flipping loop-the-loops and crazy corkscrews! With three cars to choose from, multiple music tracks and cool sound effects, Race Drivin' brings arcade-style auto speed competition right to you!

name: Race Drivin'
summary: Game Boy Port of "Race Drivin'".

name: Raccoonwave
summary: A game about a raccoon and self-worth.

name: Raccoon & Possum Just Want to Read a Book
summary:
Pages on the wind.
One keyboard, two garbage pals:
Raccoon and Possum.

Avoid obstacles and collect the pages to unlock actual pages from an actual book you can actually read. Jump over things. Jump on things. Jump on your buddy. Jump on your buddy while your buddy is also jumping. Just don't jump in pits or on birds or on those good lads who're just having a snooze and shouldn't be woken.

Press H if you get stuck.
If you get really stuck, go to Read or Title to get a new level.

name: Raccoon Laundering
summary: Based on keywords washing, raccoon, and tanuki leaf, using bipsi, a bitsy-like tool developed by candle.

name: Ragtag Heroes
summary: Ragtag Heroes is a co-op rogue-lite deckbuilder for up to 3 players! Players craft their own deck, defeat powerful foes in strategic combat, collect rare cards and relics and save the realm together!

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids: Reburrowed
summary:
Rayman Raving Rabbids Reburrowed is a fan made project aiming to reimagine the early adventure platformer version and concepts of Rayman Raving Rabbids and make a full experience of the game that could have been, but never was.
It will be an adventure game taking place in around 8 byte-sized open worlds
Each world will have its own challenges centered around platforming, combat, and utilizing each worlds unlockable mount, like a spider that can climb almost anywhere and shoot fire, or an eagle that can fly anywhere and pick up other creatures and mounts, either for a challenge, or just for fun, your choice.
The worlds will be designed so you can freely roam anywhere in the overworld, be it on foot, on a creature mount, or any of the rabbid machinery you may find.
You will fight rabbids, dance with them, and save the creatures of the glade, especially everyone's favorite, teensies, who are trapped in facilities the rabbids have constructed around each world, you must free them and take them with you to be able to summon the creature mount of the world.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters
summary:
A port of Ratchet & Clank: Size Matters, originally released on the PSP, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The story is about Ratchet and Clank as they are interrupted from their vacation to search for a kidnapped girl and encounter a forgotten race known as the Technomites.

name: RandoJumper
summary: A precision platformer of a pirate who is out there to prove himself that he can reach the top!

name: Racing Bros: Mafias Revenge
summary: Welcome to a new racing bros party adventure that will challenge your skills once more. Try the epic extraction challenge across the world or fight against your friends in crazy party modes. Are you ready for some more racing bros?

name: Randal's House
summary:
This is an interactive experience.
A new way of seeing and interacting with the ghouls.

name: Racing Car Chaos: Extreme Stunt Showdown
summary: Embrace the Chaos and Conquer the Stunts!

name: Railway Empire 2: High Voltage
summary: Strap in and turn up the power! Railway Empire 2 - High Voltage is ready to charge into the age of railway electrification. With 10 brand new electric locomotives, tycoons become well-equipped to conquer the steep mountains and impressive gorges of the Swiss Alps.

name: Rabbit's Chronicle
summary: An ARPG with a linear story. Play as Corenemo, a rabbit, exploring the Rabbit Kingdom, seeking treasures and aiding or defeating NPCs. Uncover crises while searching for the legendary Golden Apple.

name: Rangarok End Girls
summary: Girls, resist the world and burn your lives! Full-voice stylish action!!

name: Radioactive Pineapple
summary: Welcome to Musa Inc.! We are a revolutionary company that wants humanity to evolve to a peak potassium state. A race against time, solve puzzles the fastest to reach the end of our testing facility and gain your freedom... from being a pineapple.

name: RantCPU's: ClickBait
summary: Welcome to RantCPU's Realm: Click, Collect, Trade, and Treasure! Step into RantCPU's electrifying world and start your quest to build the ultimate RantCPU card set. Every click brings you closer to the legendary Gold. The more you click, the more you win! Are you ready to play?

name: Rampart Defense
summary: Rampart Defense is a classic tower defense game where you strategically deploy troops and vehicles to protect your colony from waves of enemies.

name: Raid on Rift
summary: Be prepared to defend your Ore in this multiplayer turn-based strategy game! Take control of the Imperial Navy or the dreaded Space Pirates, and use a variety of crewmates to take your opponent's Ore before they take yours!

name: Random Core Defense
summary: "In 'Random Core Defense,' acquire and enhance cores using limited resources to withstand relentless enemy onslaughts. Defeat powerful bosses and test your strategy to survive until the very end!"

name: Radland
summary: Radland is an open world survival game with a deep story and base building elements. Gather resources, build your base, grow your own food trade with survivors, complete the quests and eliminate all raider and mutant threat that is roaming what is left of United States.

name: Rancher: A New Life
summary: Start a new life as a Rancher. Travel the forest paths by quad bike, raise cattle, build, repair, and improve your farm. Take care of animals, go fishing, cook, grow vegetables, practice your accuracy on shooting range, take photos, and much more. Relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

name: Ragdoll Universe
summary: Enjoy a ragdoll physics game full of challenges and fun. Overcome levels inspired by famous situations, collect points, unlock characters and upgrades. Shoot, fight, jump, and laugh out loud in this exciting world of random characters. Join the action!

name: Ravenwood Drive
summary: Explore the eerie depths of Ravenwood Drive as Emma, drawn by a mysterious letter. Your journey quickly turns dark, where every shadow conceals a sinister truth. Dare to confront the darkness within.

name: Raceborn
summary: Raceborn is a racing game featuring miniature cars in diverse locations with extensive vehicle customization options. Win races, earn upgrades, and showcase your creativity to become a racing legend.

name: Raven's Daring Adventure
summary: Raven has challenged you to various games to decide which of you will have to complete humiliating dares. A Choose-Your-Own-Adventure ENF-Themed game with over 1,700 3D Images and voice acting. Also includes 'Raven's Daring Trivia Night' and 'Alice'

name: RaiLRhythm
summary: The concept of this music game is “Train x Rhythm”! You can enjoy the music game as if you are driving a train! Hit the notes rhythmically to become a top-notch driver!

name: Rabbit on Skateboard
summary: Welcome to the world of rabbits and carrots! In Rabbit on Skateboard

name: Raid Arena
summary: Raid Arena is a real-time team-based top-down tactical shooter. The game incorporates new mechanics, fresh concepts & graphics, as well as a focus on community to help provide an entertaining experience for everyone.

name: Raccoon on a Boat
summary: Get unforgettable photos at the ultimate eco-learning park, Raccoons on a Boat. A boat ride at night is always fun.

name: Rainbow Six: Raven Shield
summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Raven Shield is a mobile game in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Franchise based on Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Raven Shield. Developed by Gameloft, it features gameplay similar to other mobile titles in the franchise but retains the overall story of its console counterpart.

name: Raspberry
summary: Raspberry is a simple and fun way to collect and trade raspberries with others. Most importantly to declare war on the evil banana's!

name: Ramboat 2
summary: Get ready for the frenetic action of Ramboat 2! Confront enemies of all types: from paratroopers to tanks, and defeat the final bosses that will appear in the different levels. You'll have a large arsenal of weapons and grenades at your disposal, as well as vehicles to help you in your mission. Equip yourself with gadgets to increase your skills on the battlefield and play anywhere, as no internet connection is required! Download Ramboat 2 now and become the hero of the war.

name: Rapta
summary: Navigate through Silicon Sneak, where time is of the essence to save your sister. Choose to be an Ethical Hacker or one among those who hide from the police. With various minigames to challenge your dexterity, evolve with upgrades and make decisions to discover multiple endings.

name: Race Ace
summary: RACE ACE: is based on 100cc Kart Racing. The Track layout is similar in design to circuits at Rye House and Tilbury, two of Britain's tope specialists Karting venues. Experienced drivers lap at speeds of up to 70 mph often inches from the competitors. Wide slick tyres are used to give the lightweight karts phenomenal corning and breaking capabilities demanding split second timing. Race Ace is designed to reflect the closeness and speed of action experienced by kart drivers.

name: Rainchaser
summary:
Rainchaser is a vertical shoot'em up game set in a world of decaying machines and witches.

Crimson Star, a powerful magical artefact was stolen by a group of six witches. You were sent on a mission to defeat them and return the Crimson Star, with an operator Scarlett as your only help.

name: Rally Racing Drift 2024
summary: As you ready to dominate the competition and win more races?

name: Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble 2
summary: A Java Legacy Mobile Port of "Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble 2"

name: Radical Problems
summary: A Half-Life 1 Modification where you play as a Scientist in Area 9 Hazardous Waste Facilities.

name: Rabbit in Dungeon
summary: A Little Rabbit Battles Ruthless Skeletons! Escape the Grasps of Numerous Skeletons, Flee the Dungeon, and Reveal Hidden Secrets.

name: Rampage Rowing
summary: This game is a thrilling racing adventure that pits four characters against each other in a fast-paced competition.

name: Rave Rough!
summary: Rave Rough is a comedic and chaotic puzzle platformer about chucking your exposable vinyl collection to bounce your way throughout many platforming challenges! All the while butting heads with wacky friends and foes! Levels are very open ended and the moveset compliments this, with you having a lot of freedom to tackle challenges in all sorts of different ways.

name: Radiant Sea
summary: Radiant Sea is a survival sandbox game that uses nuclear contaminated water discharged into the sea to cause marine pollution, thereby affecting human survival.

name: Ragdoll Cannon
summary:
Ragdoll Cannon is the shareware version of a popular Flash physics-based browser game. Each level is a screen with simple graphics, where the objective is to shoot humanoid stick figures from a cannon towards the switch, usually a box with the words "HERE". Many obstacles are in the way, like ropes, bricks and boulders that react with each doll impact in the simulated physics model. Swirling portals transport the flying figures to another point in the screen. There's no limit of time or to the number of shots available.

The full version has 150 levels (20 in the shareware version) and three additional music tracks.

name: Ravensthorn
summary: RPG sandbox taken out from fairytales, myth and folklore. Join and get immersed in a world like no other and pave your own path.

name: Rabbit in the Clouds
summary: A small game where you control a rabbit escaping from the darkness that is chasing him. You need to jump on clouds to progress and use soap bubbles to jump even higher. During the game, you can encounter several types of power-up bonuses to gain a temporary advantage.

name: Rally Horizon
summary: You are invited to the motorsport party, come join us and Make This Race Great!

name: Rap Uncle
summary: This game features an old man who misunderstands rap and puns, so you'll have to poke fun at him. Swipe according to the icons displayed on the screen to make a tsukkomi. If you make quick hits, you will get a lot of chicks (scores).

name: Railway Empire 2: India
summary:
Railway Empire 2 – India whisks you into a gorgeous new era. Discover vast, vibrant plains, roaming elephants and bustling mega-cities, all waiting to be transformed by the blessings of the railroad.
Beginning in the Golden Era of the East India Company, you will help establish a vast railway system within the Indian subcontinent. Should you succeed, your network will become a roaring motor for growth, trade, administration and military control over India. However, a few decades later, the grip of the East India Company is waning. Work together with the British Crown while forging your own path for a prosperous railway infrastructure in the west.

name: Raid Gaza!
summary: Raid Gaza! is a short real-time strategy Flash game by Marcus Richert which satirizes the Israel–Palestine conflict from a pro-Palestinian perspective.

name: Raide
summary: train tracks!

name: Rabbiman Adventures
summary: Rabbiman Adventures is a charming 3D platformer about a small and brave hero named Yasha. Uncover the mysteries of the secret room and help your friends to save the magic forest. Interesting puzzles and many exciting acrobatic challenges await you!

name: Rail Heist
summary:
The most infamous train robbers in the west pull off a series of daring heists.
Takes place in the world of Lonestar, a setting also used by the game Grimstone.

name: Rakshasa
summary: Even death won't stop Jangi from avenging the destruction of his village by demons!

name: Ragdoll Rumble
summary: Ragdoll Rumble is a chaotic party game where toy wizards unleash wild spells in explosive spellcasting battles. Cast crazy abilities, outsmart your opponents, and prove you are the dominant doll!

name: Rain Check
summary:
Rain Check is a mystery thriller visual novel set in a coastal city with unusual weather patterns where nothing seems quite right.

Join Theodore as he turns to a wolf he meets, along with a clashing team of investigators, in a desperate attempt to find answers and uncover the truth about the strange phenomena of the city, and whatever else may be lurking in the shadows.

name: Raiden Nova
summary:
Raiden unites! Get ready to blast into a thrilling new dimension like never before!

The legendary vertical-scrolling shooter Raiden is reborn as a thrilling twin-stick 2D shooter! Freely aim and shoot with dual sticks, dodging bullets from every direction.

Level up to unlock a variety of weapons and enhancements, and upgrade your ship to fight your way through epic battles.

name: Rally Arcade Classics
summary: Rev up your engines, it's almost time to race back to the past with Rally Arcade Classics! Including 44 iconic cars from the 70's, 80's, 90's and 00's, and 48 thrilling tracks to rev up their engines to the max while drifting every close turn, you will never run out of challenges to take upon.

name: Raider
summary: Raider is a Scramble clone that has you flying over the surface of a planet before flying through a cavern bombing the installations and missile dumps. As you fly, missiles and aliens will fly towards you and you can either bomb them or use your laser. You are able to move your craft up or down, and left or right to avoid the missiles and aliens as well. If you hit a missile, alien or the planet's surface then you lose one of three lives. A fuel gauge decreases as you fly but you can increase it by bombing fuel dumps.

name: Rabbit Horror Show
summary: One would never believe that something as extraordinary as this could happen to oneself, but fate had an unusual twist in store for me. Yesterday, as the dark storm clouds gathered ominously in the sky, a bolt of lightning, like a celestial spear, found its target, and that target was me. The force of nature's wrath struck me with a ferocity that defied reason. Incredibly, I did not succumb to death's cold embrace, nor did I bear any visible wounds. It was as if the universe had chosen me for a different fate, one that would lead me to a realm beyond imagination.

name: Ravenholm
summary:
Developed in the Czech Republic by Lord Games, Ravenholm is a single-player Half-Life 2 modification based around the terrifying atmosphere, visuals and gameplay from the Half-Life 2 chapter of the same name. With a different and greatly expanded story and many new locations, you will find yourself battling many more zombies, headcrabs and more in a bid to free the town from this horrific, nightmarish infestation.

The atmosphere in the original HL2 game was both interesting, and terrefying, and that is the driving force behind our choice on creating a modifacation on that enviroment alone. All maps from this modifacation have a very similar kind of feel of atmosphere and gameplay from the original Ravenholm, but with an different and expanded story, and many new locations. So, you will find yourself battleing many more Zombies, Headcrabs, and more.

The sequel to the story after John (our player) escapes from Ravenholm goes on to Eye of the Storm.

name: Randomax
summary: Ride or drive the turbulent waves of luck toward victory! A novel rogue-lite vertical scrolling Shmup that puts your resourcefulness to the test.

name: RAWR: Little Hungry Dragon
summary: RAWR is a little dragon STG made in 9 days for the #GBJam.

name: Ragdoll Training Center
summary:
Ragdoll Training Center is a physics based arcade game where you push a ragdoll character through the challenging maps to reach the finish.
Compete for thousandths of a second differences with other players in global ranking.
Create your own maps in Map Editor and try maps made by other players.

name: RailGods of Hysterra
summary: Embark on a co-op survival journey for 1-5 players through a post-apocalyptic Lovecraftian world! Command and evolve a living, monstrous train, craft weapons, build a mobile base, gain powers, and face the Great Old Ones. Explore an ever-changing world, hold on to your sanity, and ascend to godhood!

name: RagnaTales MMORPG
summary: RagnaTales is a community-driven MMORPG that brings the classic experience of old-mmos to life with modern updates and new gameplay features. Players can explore vibrant landscapes, engage in epic battles, and experience nostalgic adventures, all while participating in dynamic group activities and large-scale events. With customized quests, unique server events, and balanced classes, RagnaTales offers both seasoned players and newcomers a refreshing take on their amazing universe!

name: Radio_Wishers
summary: A Yume Nikki styled game where you follow three amnesiacs trapped in a strange building. The only way these three can recover their memories are through finding them in their dream worlds, and have to work together in order to escape.

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.
Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.
Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - The Windman's Land
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.
Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.
Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

JUMP, GLIDE AND SOAR TO EXPLORE!
Raanaa's shamanistic powers and magic dress allows her to jump higher & further, glide and even soar through the air! In the spirit worlds the islands, trees and even mountains are floating in the air, these skills become very handy!

SEEK, FIND AND COLLECT!
To proceed in the game, Raanaa has to activate the powerful Sieidi stones by collecting enough colourful spirit essence. But there are more things to be found in the spirit worlds. Hidden objects and animals, not to mention plenty of tokens! So many in fact that it raises a question: what will happen if you collect them all?

name: Ratshaker
summary: RATSHAKER is the fun and quirky solution to all your rat problems! Hold on to the RAT, shake your arm, and watch life’s problems disappear! How far can you go?

name: Rage Effect
summary: Crafted with passion by Goldon Studios, a rising game studio from rural India, Rage Effect delivers an explosive FPS/TPS experience like no other.

name: Razor's Edge
summary:
Sarah Stone, a renowned reporter and expert fighter, decides to rescue her sister kidnapped by a gang of criminals that have taken over the city. On her journey she will encounter several enemies ready to stop her from completing the mission.
Sarah knows the dangers, her life is on a razor's edge...

name: Raion
summary:
Raion is a momentum-based platformer with multiple paths to complete each stage. It’s a continuous runner with a twist:
Raion’s speed is determined by the environment. Going uphill? He’ll slow down. Running downhill? You better be ready for some speed.

name: Rakudo yo Ori he
summary: Ren Kijirushi is captured by a strange religious group that dwells in a village deep within the mountains and is made their "God". So begins his new life within a prison, taken care of by a boy named Takumi Natsume. Until a few years ago, Tatsumi himself had borne the title of "God", and he hates Ren for currently holding the position.

name: Ramp Bike Racing
summary: Can you master the ramps and become the ultimate racing champion?

name: Random Quest
summary:
Random Quest is a slightly experimental mod with an unusual story. It is not set inside the Half Life universe and there are some game mechanics which have been subtley altered. The pace starts out slow, and builds up gradually.

This mod is intended to be more of an adventure rather than a shooter. If you approach this mod as a pure shooter, then you will probably not enjoy it.

There are some intense action scenes, but most of these come later on, much of the earlier parts of the mod are focused on adventure and storytelling.

name: Racing Champions
summary: Hone your racing skills, sharpen your strategy, and aim for the podium in the ultimate racing challenge!

name: Ragnarok: War of Gods
summary: Start your journey in Midgard as either a fledgling Swordsman, an apprentice Mage, or a rookie Acolyte as you explore a fantasy world with thousands of other players. Level up your character and upgrade your skills through quests or by defeating monsters ranging from the cute to the menacing using the wide variety of skills at your disposal. Test your might and compete with other players in the PvP arena. Group up with other players to finish quests, gain levels, defeat powerful bosses and complete difficult dungeons.

name: Rage Swarm
summary: Step into the swarm and rise as the ultimate survivor!

name: Rattle Royale
summary: 4 Player Madness!

name: Radio Rayless
summary: An unreleased futuristic racing game developed by NOW Production.

name: Raisond'etre
summary:
Will you be able to uncover your raison d'être and solve the mysteries that await in this suspenseful thriller?

In this 2D adventure title, players can explore as they please, examine objects, solve a series of riddles, and complete a variety of minigames.

name: Rally Pro Contest
summary: One player mode offers 12 accurately created 3D tracks which go through 4 different territories, they will never make you feel bored because they are not similar and monotonous at all! If you don't like driving your mobile car alone, you can play this game together with your friends through Bluetooth, or infrared port

name: Randotura
summary: Randotura is a top-down action roguelike with inventory management. Dive into bullet hell action and collect unique modifiers, all in a selfmade dungeon.

name: RAF Survival: Ocean Shark Survivor
summary: Set sail into the unknown in RAF Survival - Ocean Shark Survivor, where every wave could spell adventure or doom! Stranded on a precarious makeshift raft, your journey begins in the vast, shimmering expanse of the ocean. With nothing but your wits and determination, transform your humble vessel into a floating sanctuary of survival!

name: Raiders of the Lost Ark: Tanis
Randungeon
summary: Take on the role of a legendary hero on a quest to find the Dungeon Lord: a powerful creature lurking deep within a treacherous dungeon. Every game is different and completely random.

name: Randomly Jerk Simulator
summary: "Randomly Jerk Simulator" is a roguelite simulation game that uses a slot machine to simulate the parasitic behavior of a jerk who relies on his parents. This game does not contain any gambling behavior or cash transactions.

name: Racket Pinball
summary: The thrill of pinball meets the energy of racket sports in a VR experience.

name: Racoonfeast
summary:
"It's okay, Sophia. There's no need to be scared. Would you be so kind as to satisfy the hunger of an old creature?"
In this eerie game, you assume the role of little Sophie, who forgot to do the laundry. Despite the warning never to venture into the nocturnal chore, an unsettling question lingers: what malevolent presence awaits in the shadows of the laundry room?

name: Rainy Mari
summary: An Omori mod that explores an alternate world where Mari and Sunny have experienced a reversal of their fates.

name: R.A.V.E
summary: R.A.V.E is a multiplayer concert simulator for experiencing livestreamed events. Create the stage, set the lighting, and start the show! Your audience awaits.

name: Raptor RPG: Dino Sim
summary:
Battle against a Mecha T-Rex on the moon in low gravity!
Unlock the Secret Hub to play as a SPINOSAURUS and T-REX!
Rescue an EGG, HATCH and raise it into your own BABY Raptor!

name: Raincouver
summary: Welcome to Raincouver, a sprawling cyberpunk metropolis on the brink of oblivion. With the city falling into chaos, the government races to eliminate the threat, setting the stage for a desperate mission to rescue your loved one before Raincouver is reduced to ashes at ground zero.

name: Raid Auctus
summary: Grow your perfect raid team while the game runs! Build and train your squad from 20 unique classes, enhance their power through permanent upgrades, and watch them conquer challenging raids in Raid Auctus.

name: Raven Gold
summary: Raven Gold is a classic-style RPG featuring a handcrafted world. Explore unique dungeons, defeat powerful enemies, and conquer challenging puzzles to find rewarding treasure! Manage your resources carefully, especially your money, to achieve long term success as a fledgling adventurers guild.

name: Railink
summary: Railink takes you on a colorful puzzle/strategy adventure across deserts, icescapes and everything in between. Your job is to link up the remote Railink inhabitants to the rail network, one house at a time. Along the way you will face steep cliffs, vast waterways and tall mountains.

name: Rance VI Sonogo
summary: Collection of short stories related to Rance VI. Included in Alice no Yakata 7.

name: Rayman Garden Plus
summary:
Lost and Found the first mobile Rayman game... IS BACK!

Find the magic lums (blue balls) hidden in the Rayman Garden as quickly as possible. Advance using the arrow keys. Use your swords to fight the enemies: press on X to attack (Sword) and on C to carry out a super attack (Fire Sword). You can advance using the arrow keys. Each fight or obstacle will cost you a sword. Beware, as they are quickly used up. To save your swords, return walk mode by pressing on Z. Again, beware, if you come across an enemy without a sword, you'll lose two lives from a red monster, one life from a normal enemy. It is therefore up to you to manage your swords and avoid the enemies. One lum will win you one life. Watch out for the black hole which warrants a return penalty. But above all else you are being chased by your mortal enemy - Dark Rayman. Do not let yourself be caught or you're dead!

New features:

10 locations: Forest (Garden), Swamp (Garden), Mountain (Garden), Plant (Garden), Wood (Garden), Volcano (Garden), Candy (Rayman 1), Pirate Ship (Rayman 2: The Great Escape), Nuthouse (Rayman: The Animated Series) and Bowling (Rayman Bowling 2 by Ryemanni);

name: Rayman Lum'o'Grams
summary:
Rayman Lum'o'Grams is a puzzle fan game for PCs running Microsoft Windows currently in development by Rayman Universe, or RUNI.

The game belongs to the Picross/Nonograms genre and uses both its own and assets of most 2D projects from Rayman series, with the exception of UbiArt games. The game was first announced at Rayman Alive 2022 as part of the RUNI Showcase segment presenting Rayman Universe projects, which featured a concept trailer. The project's World Premiere took place at Rayman Alive 2023, revealing most of the details of the game. The first public demo version has been announced for early 2024, but its released has been postponed.

name: Rat Climber
summary:
You are a rat. You must climb.
Reach the top, claim the cheese!

In Rat Climber, you only have one goal: reach the top of the world.
You must navigate vertical labyrinths and make daring jumps, but be careful; one false move and you go tumbling down.

Can you guide Ratty to the top of the world and reach cheese heaven? Try your skills in the best 3D ratformer ever made!

name: Rapture Island
summary: Rapture Island is a wandering simulator with no goal & intentionally low-quality, retro graphics. It is something that could have been an early 3D game, with graphics reminiscent of the Super FX Chip. Also heavily inspired by poking around Lego Island as a kid, not engaging with any of the main quest.

name: Radiant Princess: Poni Ceres
summary:
Yui Morisaki is just a regular girl, busy with her regular everyday life like the Karate Club and an unrequited love... until one day she meets a little robot named Polka! Suddenly, she's granted the ability to transform into Radiant Princess Poni Ceres, just in time to fight against the evil forces of Zydarg, an alien organization hellbent on invading and enslaving all of humankind.

Fast forward a few months and Yui is coming to grips with her new life, though her heroic activities are starting to affect her grades. But just as she's getting used to dealing with the enemy's regular troops, it seems like Zydarg is escalating the conflict and attacking with monsters. It's time for Poni Ceres to up her game too!

name: Railbreak: Arcade Onslaught Collection
summary: Arcade on-rails insanity leads this horrifying collection of adventures!

name: Railbreak: Neon Carnage Collection
summary: Arcade neon destruction awaits in these survival horror nightmares!

name: Rayman the Fan Series Adventure 2: Curse of the Jade Lum
Ravenswatch: Legendary Edition
summary: Fallen heroes of old folk tales and legends: you are on the verge of a crucial battle against the Nightmare invading and corrupting your world. A roguelike action game by the creators of Curse of the Dead Gods, playable solo or in online co-op.

name: Railroads Online: Extended Edition
summary: Build your dream railroad across a huge open world and enjoy the main game, the Pioneer DLC Pack as well as the Explorer DLC Pack with the Extended Edition of Railroads Online.

name: Rain on Your Parade + Just Crow Things
Rabbit Raid
summary: Save your family by going on an adventure as a cute bunny.

name: Railroads Online: Pioneer DLC
summary:
Be one of the first to conquer the untamed country with the Pioneer DLC. This pack contains the Bell’s Gap 0-6-0 tender locomotive built by the Bells Gap Railroad of Pennsylvania. This 15 ton 0-6-0 was the first engine to move freight and passengers along their 8.5 mile route between Bell’s Mills and Lloyd. As a 0-6-0, this steam engine is suited to switching duties and light freight service. The Pioneer DLC also contains the unique Red Mountain Depot building, which was originally located in a railroad wye in the town of Red Mountain in Colorado. You can also look forward to a special Lake Valley Skin for the Montezuma engine.

This pack contains:

The Bell’s Gap 0-6-0 tender locomotive

The Red Mountain Depot building

The Lake Valley special skin for the Montezuma engine

name: Railroads Online: Explorer DLC
summary:
Expand your Railroads Online experience with the Explorer DLC. Open up untamed lands and discover diverse flora and fauna, as well as a new locomotive and new caboose wagon.

Take control and embellish the landscape of the West by placing animals and items of nature however you choose. Blaze new trails across the U.S., driving the expansion of commerce, industry, and railways with the powerful FE&MV 4-8-0 Mastodon locomotive and the newly designed D&RG Class 2 Caboose wagon.

FE&MV 4-8-0 Mastodon locomotive with 3 skins (black/red, green, black)

D&RG Class 2 Caboose wagon with a green and red skin

Placeable wild animals (Cougar, Bear, Young Bear, Bison, Golden Eagle, Bald Eagle, Deer)

Placeable unique environmental and nature items

name: Rainbow Expansion 3
summary: A level pack for Splatoon 2: Octo Expansion.

name: Rainbow Canyon 2
summary: A level pack for Splatoon 2's single player mode. It adds 6 new levels, new custom music, new textures and a new boss.

name: Ranch Store Simulator
summary: Immerse yourself in Ranch Store Simulator, where you care for adorable animals, grow fresh vegetables, and manage your own store! Feed, water, and harvest to keep your farm thriving. Sell your goods, attract customers, and expand your business in this cozy, fun-filled farming adventure.

name: Random Dungeon Game
summary: Calling all brave adventurers! Do you think you have what it takes to dive deep into a world of ever changing dungeons and come out alive? Don't be too hasty, one wrong turn and you could end up starting at the beginning again! Each adventure will be different from your last!

name: Race Driver Grid 3D
summary: Drive the most powerful racing cars, conquer the most prestigious official race tracks, win championships in city competitions and street races in Japan, USA and Europe! Start small as an obscure racer, build your career, and then hire the best drivers to build an invincible and universally recognized racing team. Already released on video game consoles, the game gives you the opportunity to experience the most gambling and exciting races on your mobile phone. Speed and excitement!

name: Rabbit Trail
summary: Wake up in a magical forest... as a rabbit. Something strange has happened to you, and solving it won’t be easy. Explore fascinating worlds, face challenging puzzles, and unravel the mystery of how you lost your human form. Each jump brings you closer to the truth... Are you ready to discover it?

name: Race Track Maniacs
summary: Gentlemen, start your engines!

name: Rainbow Festival 3
summary:
Rainbow Festival and Rainbow Festival 2 are games that I made on Scratch in 2013 and 2016. Earlier this month (June 2021) marked the ten year anniversary of my Scratch account, so I decided to continue this series outside of Scratch.

The appeal of the first two Rainbow Festival games (to me) is the absurd amount of frustratingly bad design. The games are fun because they aren't fun. When you get hit by an obstacle, instead of dying, you experience a fate worse than death: knock-back. Many levels rely on getting lucky with random spawns and behavior.

I decided to take these terrible ideas and expand upon them in the third game. On top of including intentionally annoying mechanics, I filled the entire game with inside jokes and references that only a couple people will actually understand.

Oh, there are also a few major secrets.

name: Rapax
summary: It is a dot-picture action game where you just fight, change, and follow the path to defeat your enemies.

name: Ragnarok M: Classic
summary:
Zeny Everywhere Zeny Buys It All

Dive into Ragnarok M: Classic, a fair, shop-free adventure focused on gameplay! Zeny is the only currency, with every item obtainable through gameplay. Enjoy free Offline Battle, a lifetime Monthly Pass, and safe +15 refinement. Master classic jobs, switch roles in real-time, and team up for epic instances. Join guilds and forge friendships in this reimagined RO journey!

name: Rain Kills
summary: Smash crystals, dodge rain, make money, upgrade your equipment, keep going.

name: Rawyokan
summary: Rawyokan is a single player fighting game with focus on simplicity – one button allows the player to unleash a series of strikes to the opponent or parry incoming attacks when timed correctly. Fight your way through multiple opponents and challenge the grandmaster.

name: Railbreak: 90s Throwback Collection
summary: Is a bundle of survival horror games from developer Dead Drop Studios.

name: Ravengrave: Iron Bonds
summary: You’re a young viking when your world falls apart: your father has fled, leaving you behind with the blacksmith... and a crushing debt. You must master blacksmithing from scratch to survive. Will you rise to the challenge and forge your own path, or will the pressure break you first?

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - The Frozen World
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.

Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.

Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

JUMP, GLIDE AND SOAR TO EXPLORE!
Raanaa's shamanistic powers and magic dress allows her to jump higher & further, glide and even soar through the air! In the spirit worlds the islands, trees and even mountains are floating in the air, these skills become very handy!

SEEK, FIND AND COLLECT!
To proceed in the game, Raanaa has to activate the powerful Sieidi stones by collecting enough colourful spirit essence.
But there are more things to be found in the spirit worlds. Hidden objects and animals, not to mention plenty of tokens! So many in fact that it raises a question: what will happen if you collect them all?

name: Radical Dreamers: Le Trésor Interdit
summary:
"RADICAL DREAMERS - Le Trésor Interdit -" was released in 1996 as a standalone game, and has not been easily accesible for play in recent years. Players can experience the story that went on to become the basis for CHRONO CROSS in an audio novel format. Here, an alternate story of the RADICAL DREAMERS, a group of three thieves - Serge, Kid and Magil - unfolds in a parallel world.

*You can switch between the new and old versions of the 3D models and illustrations.
*The 3D models, illustrations, font and background filter cannot be toggled separately. They will all be switched together.

name: Radioactivity
summary: Radioactivity is a co-op survival horror. You are a Liquidator! Together or alone, help your state clean up post-apocalyptic radioactive wilderness. Plan each deployment, fight radiation spread and the creatures that it produces. Together, make WEA flourish once more!

name: Radiolength
summary: A short adventure game about a young girl leaving her hometown.

name: Ragnarok Idle Adventure Plus
summary: Immerse yourself in a vertical idle MMORPG that pushes the boundaries of the genre, offering an elevated and polished adventure for solo players

name: Raiders of the Apocalypse
summary: Explore dangerous bunkers packed with mutants, scavenge vital loot, and race against dwindling oxygen. Upgrade your shelter, craft gear, and risk it all for bigger rewards. Solo or co-op, see how deep you dare go!

name: Razorback
summary: Razorback is a futuristic racing game inspired by Trackmania, featuring high-speed ship piloting with unique vertical engine mechanic and dynamic challenges. Compete in creative time-attack races for adrenaline-fueled fun!

name: Raev: Kingdom on the Distant Shores
summary: Build an empire, founding its villages and cities. Every kingdom started with a single bonfire, and RAEV allows you to create your own thriving civilization across a sprawling continent. Craft interwoven cityscapes, inspire your people, and build a kingdom to forge your path to greatness.

name: Radical Rappelling
summary:
Ready your rope to race down ridiculous ridges with Rip and Roxy !
Feel the rush and hold on tight as Radical Rappelling is back!
Join Rip and Roxy as you rappel down mountains at breakneck speed using your rapid reflexes.
Pull off death-defying tricks by ricocheting between launch pads, riding rainbows and rocketing over obstacles in the most ridiculous adventure ever.
Rack up coins and complete rockin’ missions to unlock sweet new gear for Rip and Roxy, the most fearless risk-takers on the planet.
It’s random. It’s ridiculous. It’s really, really rad. Play now!

name: Raccoon is Hungry
summary: Racoon is Hungry is the second installment of the "Is Hungry" series. Follow the adventures of a gluttonous racoon searching for food, but in the city the food is not as easy to pass by on the ground. To find food the racoon must search inside dumpsters for edibles food, such as apples, slices of piza, hamburguers, grapes and so on. But watch out, as food is not the only thing that is possible to find on a dumpster! What kind of surprise awaits the curious racoon?

name: Radiant Elusion
summary: RADIANT ELUSION (光放逃避) delves into the contemporary condition haunted by the past via the visuals of early 3D-graphics and interactive language of a single player first-person platformer with Combo-Collectathon progression- and Time-Attack systems enveloped by a numbing electronic soundtrack!

name: Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army
summary: The story of apprentice detective and Devil Summoner extraordinaire Raidou Kuzunoha XIV returns in this remastered classic! Call upon your demons to solve supernatural mysteries and dispose of enemies.

name: Ramek: Total Machine Death
summary: In a future Earth of machine overlords, warrior chieftain Ramek enacts a terrible revenge upon his mechanical enemy. Fly Ramek's genetically-engineered war-budgie through five levels of non-stop carnage, from the irradiated sands of the Dead Zone, to the iron towers of Machine City.

name: Ramen Shop Simulator
summary: Take control of your very own Ramen Shop! Transform a cozy, worn-out Japanese alley back into a vibrant hotspot. From scrubbing floors to cooking the perfect bowl of ramen. Decorate every corner, upgrade everything, and create your unique restaurant. The aroma of success is just a bowl away!

name: Ratio (Rat Patio)
summary: You're just a humble rat. Use your trusty ratling gun turret to dispatch the onslaught of aliens and defend your ratio (rat patio)!

name: RapidFire
summary: This is a FPS shooting battle type of game, using a variety of weapons and vehicles to combat the battlefield, enjoy the pleasure of scene destruction

name: Rain and the Wolf
summary: A boys love / yaoi visual novel based loosely on Little Red Riding Hood. Follow Rain as he meets a mysterious werewolf, Zero, deep in the woods, and shape his fate with your choices. Will Rain be able to tame the werewolf, or will he meet a grisly end?

name: Rax Runner!
summary: An endless runner featuring the infamous 43 of Akron

name: Ranfren: Not Lucid
summary: Fan-made visual novel for the webcomic RANFREN produced by captainhowdie

name: Rack and Run
summary: The story is from the perspective of a hunter who finally gets her first kill. However, it turns out to be way more than she bargained for! Will the hunter now become the hunted?

name: RanDungeon
summary: Mobile Dungeon roguelike in 8-bit style made by Dawid Poleszczuk

name: Range
summary: Range is a game that helps you stay on-task and focused when you want to be. Set a timer for your focus session, the tasks you want to complete, and enjoy a relaxing, distraction-free drive through a hand-drawn world.

name: Rammy's Great Adventure 1&2 Remake
summary: The full remake of the randomly generated dungeon RPG "Rammy's Great Adventure 1 & 2" is here! Join tomboy treasure hunter Rammy for hidden treasures. Revamped controls and UI, nostalgic pixel art. Challenge Mode, new foes, encyclopedia, color options, and online rankings.

name: Rain98
summary: Tokyo, 1998. A rain that never ends and a girl who wants everything to end. Two lonely youths will change the world with their choices.

name: Ramen Simulator
summary: Ever dreamed of crafting the perfect bowl of ramen? In Ramen Simulator, you can unleash your creativity and build your own unique ramen style!

name: Rapid Impact
summary: Rapid Impact is an online PvP-PvE shooter in a post-apocalyptic world. Fight players or AI in various modes. The game evolves with community feedback, shaping its future through player voting! Wishlist Rapid Impact now and be among the first to experience intense PvP-PvE battles!

name: Rabit
summary: RABIT is an arcade style platforming game with retro graphics and a mysterious atmosphere. It's central mechanic is the ability to toggle certain object on and off at the click of a button. This along with several other movement abilities allows for some devious and exciting platforming sections.

name: Rakka: Wake 01 - Soot
summary: A visual novel paired with point-and-click elements, Rakka distinguishes itself with its breadth of hand-drawn assets, detailed backgrounds, charming character art, and unique paper-cut style. Complimented by the art is the incredible original soundtrack; spearheaded by the minds behind The PMT, it oozes indie charm. Both serve in tandem, dragging the player into the character and dialogue driven world of Rakka. Think you can make it to its thrilling conclusion?

name: Rayadium
summary: Explore a cave and rescue time-traveling miners from the future, all while overcoming your weaknesses and uncovering a mysterious crystal in this platformer fantasy adventure game!

name: Raw Element
summary: An open survival game, cartoon style of the game screen and the changing grassland day and night, bring you different game experience.

name: Rat Raze / Road to Riches: Tilt Five
RampageRunner
summary: Run your way as far as you can in RampageRunners. Where you dodge and smash through obstacles in chase of the highest score.

name: Ramhart
summary: Ramhart is a small indie game from a single developer with turn-based combat, RPG elements and a story set in the not-too-distant future.

name: Rainy Day
summary: A hand drawn style obstacle avoidance game. How to deal with rainy days if don't like it?

name: Railway Chai Wala
summary: Step into the world of Ramu, a spirited railway chaiwala at the bustling Fakripur station. Life isn’t just about brewing chai—it’s steeped in mystery! Uncover dark, masala-filled secrets in this Psychological Thriller Game with a blend of suspense and Indian flavor!

name: Race or Crash: Secret Racer League
summary: Race or Crash is a Combat-Racing game, where you can smash into your enemies drivin' your musclecar! You also can choose manual or automatic gear switching! Some nonsense happens here & you need to find out what's goin' on on this goddamn mountain! C'mon, dude!!!

name: R/A\W
summary: Anthology of anti-war stories by award-winning authors from Russia

name: Rampart
summary: The Japanese Game Boy port of Rampart changes all of the sprites for a japanese-related fantasy RPG-like setting, including the enemies, in contrast to the medieval themes of the Western release.

name: Raiders of Blackveil
summary: Join the rebellion against the evil cooperation Blackveil in this action-packed roguelite for 1-3 players. Select your MOBA-like champion, collect RPG-style loot and infiltrate Blackveil’s massive factory. Wreak havoc, and smuggle out loot to get INSANELY powerful!

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - Land of the Birds
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.

Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.

Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

JUMP, GLIDE AND SOAR TO EXPLORE!
Raanaa's shamanistic powers and magic dress allows her to jump higher & further, glide and even soar through the air! In the spirit worlds the islands, trees and even mountains are floating in the air, these skills become very handy!

SEEK, FIND AND COLLECT!
To proceed in the game, Raanaa has to activate the powerful Sieidi stones by collecting enough colourful spirit essence.
But there are more things to be found in the spirit worlds. Hidden objects and animals, not to mention plenty of tokens! So many in fact that it raises a question: what will happen if you collect them all?

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - Realm of The Giants
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.

Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.

Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - Valhalla
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.

Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.

Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

name: Raanaa: The Shaman Girl - Helheim
summary:
Raanaa is a third person adventure 3D platformer.

Raanaa, a courageous shaman girl, helps the spirit worlds that are in danger. With the help of her shaman abilities and her magical dress, she can defy gravity.

Raanaa travels through wondrous spirit realms and collaborates with different Gods and Goddesses to fight evil spirits and deities in order to obtain balance in the universe and save humanity.

Raanaa travels through spirit worlds that are all inspired by old Saami and Norse stories and mythology. In every episode the player gets to visit in a new spirit world. Become the savior of the spirit worlds!

name: Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army - Digital Deluxe Edition
Rack Attack!
summary: Rack ‘em up and sharpen your pool skills in this exciting mobile game designed for both casual and mobile players and real-world pool enthusiasts! Every day brings a fresh, different billiards skills challenge — from testing your speed to measuring your precision, shots, consistency, and strategy. Earn free daily games to practice and simply link your wallet, pay a small fee, and compete against others to climb the leaderboard and get rewarded.

name: Rat Wrap
summary: Rat Wrap is a single-screen precision platformer, where you can only jump when you're off the ground and are able to wrap about the screen (hence the name). You are THE RAT and you must get THE CHEESE, that's all you need to know!

name: Raging Bill
summary:
A wild TPS sandbox in a mini open world, inspired by Goat Simulator.
Shooter, melee, racing, loot, exploration, bodycam… all mashed into one!
A love letter to the 80s/90s and pop culture, packed with Easter eggs.

name: Race Against a Duck
summary:
"Water... Land... Sky..."

"Do you have what it takes to defeat nature's All Terrain Vehicle?"

name: Radley Ravencroft's Spy Web Mystery
summary: Follow a murder investigation in this point & click 1920s murder mystery. Solve room escape style lock puzzles to unlock Radley's interviews with the suspects. Use your newfound information to draw connections between characters, and fill out a timeline of events.

name: Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army - Guest Demons Pack
summary: Popular demons from the Shin Megami Tensei series have been added in this remaster! Additional downloadable content that allows the players to recruit these demons as their allies.

name: Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army - Demons of the Aril Rift
summary: Additional downloadable content that grants a special book upon completing a "Trial of a Hundred Demons."

name: Ramen! Road to Mastery
summary:
Noodles! Soup! Toppings!
Fill ramen orders as quickly as possible and follow the road to mastery!

name: Rank: Warmaster Bunker Buster
summary: Rank Warmaster: Bunker Buster meets tactical control with strategic execution, bringing RTS elements to this sci-fi, action tower defense. Acquire resources as you further secure your bunker strategically placing perimeters and defensive and offensive units.
developers: Laser Beams & Particle Streams Software, Inc.

name: Ramen
summary: Indie Action FPS Strategy. Ramen is a cranky old man with a death wish. Keep him alive if you can.

name: Rabbit Jumping DX
summary:
Rabbit Jumping DX is the not-at-all-anticipated follow up to a game almost no one has played, this time with less colour, and more of almost everything else.

Run, jump, and crawl through five side-scrolling stages filled with bears, foxes, and other dangers as you rescue the lost bunnies. (If you want to, no pressure.)

Don't be fooled by the cute graphics, this game is tough as nails, but with persistence or maybe a lucky rabbit's foot I'm sure you'll reach the end

Features a catchy retro soundtrack that is sure to get stuck in your head, super smooth gameplay at 48-ish frames-per-second, and a progress save feature for when you need to take a li'l break.

Enjoy!

name: Race Jam
summary: Experience the thrill of the 1990s with Race Jam - an action packed arcade-style racing game! Featuring retro-inspired tracks, high speed gameplay and an authentic throwback vibe. Race Jam: Exhilarating 90's Arcade Racing like you remember, But BETTER

name: Rana Card
summary: "Rana Card" is a roguelite card game where you manage a farm, complete KPI for the Frog. Draw cards in exciting, tense moments, you’ll navigate or exploit time explosion, earn packs and chests, build your deck, and play cards to earn gold. Face strategic choices, disasters, cataclysm along the way.

name: Randy the Racoon
summary: Randy the Raccoon is an open-world action comedy where you're a raccoon in a car. Cruise around a vibrant island, chat with sassy animals and take down the goose gang. Randy reacts to everything you do with sass, humor, or just a lot of yelling. So, try not to crash... or do!

name: Rain;Check
summary: RAIN;CHECK tells a short story set in a small, remote town about a girl just trying to get by in the middle of a rainy, tumultuous night. On this special occasion, an unexpected storm of events brews ever closer.

name: Rainbow Mosaics 10: Christmas Helper
summary:
Your amazing robot helper is back to bring you some Christmas cheer!

When a young couple brings Helper into their home to assist with the holidays preparations, they soon find that this arrangement was more than they bargained for. Helper’s first task seemed simple enough - decorate the Christmas tree and prepare a festive dinner. It’s clear something has gone wrong when Helper hangs sausages from the tree and places ornaments in the soup! It’s most likely a flaw in Helper’s configuration. Solve these delightfully festive mosaics puzzles to get Helper on track.

name: Railway Empire 2: Bella Italia
summary:
From the snow-capped Alps in the north, along the Apennine Mountains, to the sun-soaked Gulf of Taranto, Railway Empire 2 – Bella Italia offers beautiful landscapes and spirited challenges. Uniquely Italian locomotives allow you to steam through any mission, be it economical or more… familial in nature, as you expand your railroad network set against the majestic backdrop of the Colosseum and ancient aqueducts.
Start your railway business in Rome and the Papal State, where waves of tourists await seamless connections to see the wonders of Antiquity. Down south, a different kind of challenge awaits as you discover the many branches of La Famiglia – and work to make yourself a name among them . Meanwhile, the north desperately needs help after a devastating war, with new railways required to fuel its financial recovery.

name: Raddle
summary: A word ladder transformation game, where each "rung" changes the previous word or phrase into a new word or phrase by applying one of the clues.

name: Rabbit Hole
summary: A brain-opening, brain-burning puzzle game, control rabbits to escape from this mysterious world by moving plots!

name: Raven 2
summary: ダークファンタジーMMORPG

name: Raccateer
summary: Raccateer is a colony sim idle game. Recruit and upgrade raccoons each with unique personalities and stats, manage their equipment and synergize your team to become a Trashilionaire. Go from trash to riches in this tight, narrative-focused idler

name: Radio Ghosts
summary: Radio Ghosts is a narrative game about geometry tests, vampire baristas, and camping with your mom.

name: Raptors vs. Goblins
summary: When two unorthodox worlds collide, you get RAPTORS VS. GOBLINS. Fight of hordes of goblins and defend your kingdom! Reclaim what's yours and keep fighting to get stronger. Throw the Goblin King out of the ranks and save the Island in this top-down tower defense!

name: Radventure: The Rise of Ryle
summary: Ryle, a half-elf, is in search of the grave of Dwemmit, his old adventuring partner, in order to pee on it. That sentence used a lot of commas... is it grammatically correct? Probably not. Based on a true story that I made up.

name: Racing Rebels Mud Clash
summary: Racing Rebels Mud Clash is a muddy, high-speed racing challenge where players unlock new maps and buy better cars by winning races. Earn cash based on your finishing position, upgrade your garage, and blast past rivals with powerful nitro boosts.

name: Raptorfall: Survival
summary: You crash on an alien planet. Hostile creatures hunt you. Search the wreckage, gather resources, build a base, and defend it against waves of predator attacks.

name: Railway Empire 2: Industrial Wonders
summary: Plunge into the beating heart of the industrial revolution in Railway Empire 2 – Industrial Wonders. This DLC challenges you to expand your rail networks from the Ruhr Valley in Germany to the construction of the legendary monuments of the Eiffel Tower and the revolutionary Hoover Dam.

name: Ranch Farm and Store Simulator
summary: Design, build, and manage your own ranch and store from the ground up. Grow crops, raise livestock, and keep your shelves stocked with fresh products for customer to buy. Expand your business, hire employees, and transform your humble ranch into a thriving marketplace.

name: Randomlife Reborn
summary:
A fangame that I am making about the youtuber RANDOMLIFE. It is like "terroro", his release will be soon. This is a Horror game in which you have to repair a car to escape, this game could have a second part in the future.
Many streamers are in this game like "miguelillo_rl" or "zapatos27"

name: Rainbow Cloud: A Gay RPG
summary: This is an action role-playing game set in a medieval world, where you can complete quests, defeat monsters, discover new lands and romance many handsome male NPCs, including characters such as humans, demons, angels, giants, orcs, bearfolk, tigerfolk, werewolves, elves, and more.

name: Rag Doll
summary: Fighting based on physics. Rag Doll is a 2D game with cartoon graphics, where you control the character's head, and the body moves according to the laws of physics! Play Story Mode, fight in multiplayer or local battle 1 vs 1!

name: Railborn
summary: Railborn is a survival game where you build your train piece by piece. Navigate a world entangled by branching tracks. Find rare plants to cultivate on your farms. Upgrade your train - manage its power systems, direct resource flow, and distribute water. Designed for 1 to 4 players.

name: Rabbit Evolution Merge
summary:
I’ve got ears for days and big teeth, and I can bring you eggs but I’m not a bird. What am I? An ugly waiter? No, dummy, a rabbit! It might not be Easter, but it’s definitely bunny season for the addictive Evolution series, so get ready to drag, drop and dare, because your new favorite pet will be a hare!

Mix and match to your heart’s content and fill the world with tons of cute, fluffy and sometimes slightly scary rabbit mutations. It’s so adorable you’ll want to hug your screen!

name: Raccoon Cocoon
summary: Raccoon Cocoon is a charming pixel art puzzle game where you join Grandma Raccoon and help her organize the little details of life in a relaxing way. From everyday clutter to the small messes nature brings, everything is waiting to be tidied up with calm and care!

name: Raft Days
summary: RAFT Days is a Sokoban-like puzzle + simple trading game. You travel across the sea from port to port, loading goods and tools onto your ship. You can save money by trading, expand your raft, hire sailors to help you, and enrich your journey. The waves and winds make this game relaxing to play.

name: Rabbit Jump
summary:
Make the little rabbit jump through the holes without hitting the branches, go as high as you can!

What is your best score?

name: Ravenhille: Awakened
summary: Hunt down the mythical beast, created in desperation during the final days of World War II. A failed Nazi project known as “Wolfsklinge” unleashed an ancient creature from the depths of hell. Now, it’s your task to lift the curse that haunts the village and the forest. It won’t be easy.

name: Ravenridge
summary: You are being watched. Tested. In RAVENRIDGE, uncover the truth behind a forgotten prison as detective Ethan Ward. What begins as an investigation soon leads deep into your own mind. Are you in control, or just another subject?

name: Radium Lux
summary: Radium Lux is a physics-based skill game with puzzle elements. The sphere that the player must navigate to the target is attracted by two tractor beams and gravity.
