Using these three forces from different directions enables the player to maneuver the sphere very organically through the level.

name: Rally Drive Championship Car Racing Game
summary:
Push the Limits.
Chase the Clock.
Own the Road.

name: Raptor Runner
summary: Raptor Runner is an endless runner game featuring a raptor with hoverboots and laserpistol. You have to jump over obstacles and shoot down drones that try to take you down. The game gets gradually faster after every obstacle avoided.

name: Race Attorney
summary: "Ace Attorney" meets "Papers Please" meets speed dating

name: Raven-Star
summary:
A tiny Game Boy Color game about finding a place where you belong.

You are a raven born without wings. Cast out of your village, you must find a way to return home. Run and jump around The Ravine on your journey to find the legendary Wishing Star.

name: R.A.T.: Human Error – Episode One
summary: The world ended. Now the real nightmare begins. Deep underground, a child wakes in a infected facility. Minds are breaking. Bodies are changing. Crawl through vents, follow echoes, and escape before it’s too late. Your mother is waiting.

name: Racing Moto
summary: Racing Moto is a fast paced racing game. You never dare drive so fast in the real world! Control your moto with incredible fast speed during traffic rush time! Also enjoy beautiful view during the journey - desert, city, bridge, sea and forest!

name: Rake In: Scoring Big With Monster Girls!
summary: For generations, a legend has been passed down about the mysterious Treasure Island. The island is home to a vast amount of gold... and it could be yours for the taking! Embark on a Monster Girl-catching escapade as you uncover secrets in a riveting search for riches!

name: Rattus Velocitas
summary: In Rattus VELOCITAS, race as Rats with Jet-powered hoverbikes competing for pole position in procedurally generated race courses! Collect items to give yourself an advantage or take out the competition in this high speed rodent frenzy!

name: Rat Toy
summary: A small platformer where the mouse has to reach the cheese.

name: Raccoons to Riches
summary: Raccoons to Riches is a fuzzy Roguelike Deckbuilding fantasy Item Shop game. Sell Items, learn powerful Business Tactics, grow your Inventory and Customer Base, Craft new Items, and Customize your Shop to make incredible profits. Can you make rent, or will you go out of business?

name: Rage Room: Catharsis
summary: No rules, no limits—just pure destruction! Use a sledgehammer, baseball bat, pistol, and more to release your stress. Take on Challenge Mode to race against time or go all out in Free Roam Mode!

name: Radial Overdrive
summary: Strap in, hotshot! Welcome to Radial Overdrive! Weave through the city of opportunity and style in your state-of-the-art high-speed hovercraft. Upgrade your vehicle to keep those turns smooth and nerves loose. Push the limits of what's possible in this endless racing rogue-lite!

name: Raider
summary:
Master your piloting skills as you manoeuvre through a labyrinth of caverns where danger lurks around every corner.

Infiltrate a Xeronium mining installation and cut off supply lines before the corrupt BeamGen corporation invades the galaxy.

But be warned, enemy drones are out in full force. Remain on high alert as you explore the Vensella cavern system, test your skills in epic space battles and destroy the reactor core!

name: Ragnar
summary: In this epic Norse myth-inspired roguelike dungeon crawler, wield divine power to challenge Loki and uncover the secrets of the Nine Realms through the branches of Yggdrasil. Grow stronger and reshape Ragnarok’s fate with legendary weapons of the gods.

name: Raiders Rise
summary: Raiders Rise is a multiplayer action-strategy game where two teams must cooperate and compete to collect crystals. Survive alien threats, outmaneuver rivals, and choose help or betray? In this chaotic battleground, teamwork is key… until it isn’t.

name: Race of the Nine Worlds
summary: Take part in the Race of Nine Worlds! Play as one of the nine Path Racers, rush through the tracks of fantastic planets, go through an exciting story campaign and become a legend who will restore peace among the warring galaxies.

name: Raptor
summary: The protagonist, a reporter, receives information that a laboratory is conducting experiments that defy the law. He visits the laboratory to find out what the experiment is, but regrets his decision to come... A 3D escape horror in which he explores while being chased by a tracker using only lights!

name: Rake
summary: Rake is a First-Person Horror game where you hunt down (or be hunted by) The Rake. Use Trail Cameras, Bear Traps and other tools to assist in hunting it down before it gets to you first.

name: Ragnarok Crush
summary:
Monster Showdown × Arcane Awakening! Official Ragnarok Online match-merge battler returns with a strategic twist!

Ragnarok Crush — Your epic quest begins now! Adventurers, assemble! Step into a world where your favorite Ragnarok Online characters and classes unite in a new match-merge strategy game. Solve ingenious puzzles, power up your heroes, and face MVP Bosses in the ultimate showdown across the Midgard continent!

name: Rat Dreams
summary: No walking, only dodge rolls.

name: Rainy Day Spider Solitaire HD
summary: Grab your umbrella and join Octavia for a classic spider solitaire experience. The goal is to bring out the sun by clearing all the cards.

name: Raid Rush
summary: mobile game by VooDoo, available on google play and also in the apple app store for download - free to play game with in game purchases

name: Rage Tower
summary: Rage Tower is a pixel-art platformer full of traps and frustration. You play as a small white character thrown to the top of a deadly tower. Your goal is to descend safely, navigating handcrafted traps, collapsing floors, and deceptive safe zones. The game blends cheerful visuals with punishing level design, offering a contrast between cute aesthetics and relentless difficulty. Expect emotional outbursts, broken keyboards, and the irresistible urge to try “just one more time”

name: RaynGames
summary: RaynGames is an interactive gaming website designed for streamers and their communities. It offers a collection of simple, engaging multiplayer games that streamers can play live with their viewers. All games are free to access and run directly in the browser with no downloads required. The site emphasizes social interaction, quick matchmaking, and fun experiences that are easy to join and play during live streams.

name: Radiant Silvergun
summary: The home port of Radiant Silvergun for the Sega Saturn includes the original arcade game, as well as an added story mode, featuring new FMV sunscreens as well as remixed and reorder stages, five new bosses, and the ability to carry over weapon upgrades after a game over.

name: RazePact
summary: A little soul named Soul is searching for answers in a mysterious dungeon. Facing several enemies along the way, she will learn more about the place and who she is. The game refers to classics and has a frenetic hack n' slash gameplay mixed with platforming.

name: Rat's Lair
summary: Horror game that combines elements of sandbox, horror, stealth, puzzle and a small open world.

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator: Rally Pack - Vol. 1
summary: Contains: Hromaz Regane, Hromaz S1600 and Inquiry S60P

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator: Rally Pack - Vol. 2
summary: Contains: Mizuduki Revolution, Purdo 370 and Chaya Panther

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator Rally: Pack - Hybrid Horizon
summary: Contains: Inquiry S20H, Chaya Gepard and Tamashimi Roadster

name: Rat's Contracts
summary: Slip into the silence of the suburbs - break into houses, outsmart wary residents, and find unconventional paths to your objectives.

name: Radial Fusion
summary: 2D retro style orbital space arcade shooter game. In this multilevel game, use your ship's beam and plasma weapon to fend off enemy ships and mines. Prevent the star from exploding and destroying the solar system.

name: Raven II
summary: Born in Blood. Built for War. The Brutal Dark Fantasy MMORPG RAVEN2

name: Rat Race Combat: Zombie Tribute
summary: Rat Race Combat: Zombie Tribute 🧟 A zombie survival mode where you fight through endless waves of the undead, earn credits to upgrade weapons, unlock new areas, grab power-ups, and discover hidden bonuses. Every run is a fresh grind through chaos.

name: Ratico Puzzle Adventure
summary: Embark on an epic puzzle adventure as a clever rat, navigating intricate mazes, aiming to reach the coveted cheese in 90 levels. With limitless retries and intuitive controls, Ratico Puzzle Adventure offers a delightful journey filled with surprises, all while unraveling the thrilling adventure

name: Ratman
summary: Ratman is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. A creature called “Ratman” is terrorizing local dwarfs. You and your fellow brave dwarf knights decide to sneak into his lair in order to burn his supplies. Find matches and burn his cheese stock, but don't get caught by the murderous Ratman!

name: Ravenrift
summary: Craft custom brews from foraged ingredients, run your own potion shop, decorate your home, and fall in love with a mysterious town in a cozy new world filled with magic. Welcome to Ravenrift, a charming town where witches and other magical creatures live side by side.

name: Rapid Stream 2
summary: Based on JungleTac's Sunplus SPG2xx game Rapid Stream. This version starts on what would be the second level of the 16-bit version of the game.

name: R.A.S.P. Mobility-Unit
summary: R.A.S.P Mobility-Unit - Is a Retro Arcade Third-Person Tactical Shooter, with a realistic Military theme. We love the old school shooter feeling from 2000 Era games on the Play Station, and N64. f you are a fan of the classics you will love R.A.S.P Mobility-Unit our Retro Arcade Shooter.

name: Raccoon Crime Spree
summary: Raccoon Crime Spree is a chaos mischief sandbox! Steal cars, dodge cops, bop pedestrians—and wreak raccoon mayhem across the city.

name: Rawring Candies
summary: A couch co-op for players looking for confectionary chaos. “Sweet and Salty” NO! It’s all about Sweet v/s Salty here

name: Race For Nuts
summary:
Save your squirrel tribe from the impending disaster and help other squirrels to escape!
High mountains and icy valleys, hot deserts and bottomless pits await you!
You will find new friends and enemies. The world of the Race For Nuts is waiting for you!

summary: Add the Tamashimi Roadster to your rally car lineup! Expand your collection, take on new repairs, and test it on the rally stage.

summary: Add the Tamashimi Torol to your rally car lineup! Expand your collection, take on new repairs, and test it on the rally stage.

name: Rally Mechanic Simulator: Wictuz Lopo
summary: Add the Wictuz Lopo to your rally car lineup! Expand your collection, take on new repairs, and test it on the rally stage.

name: Ravager: Moon-friendly Edition
summary: Ravager - Moon-Friendly Edition is a role-playing game where you play a young dragon, determined to reclaim his birthright. To do so, you will need to build your power, ally with dark forces, evade justice, and return to rule.

name: Rachel's Journal
summary: You wake up in a maintenance room, alone. Your partner's journal is out in the open. You probably shouldn't read it.

name: Ragnarok Online 3
summary: Official Sequel to Ragnarok Online, recapturing the original charm of RO in a modernized system. RO, as it was meant to be.

name: Ragdoll Boxing Multiplayer
summary: Dive into Ragdoll Boxing, the ultimate physics-driven boxing game where every punch counts. Powered entirely by realistic, real-time physics, this game brings you closer to the raw excitement and unpredictability of a genuine boxing match. Control your boxer with intuitive active ragdoll mechanics.

name: Raccoin: Coin Pusher Roguelike
summary: A coin-pushing dopamine machine. RACCOIN is a roguelike deckbuilder where you combine special coins with powerful items to trigger wildly satisfying combos. Stack shiny towers, spin the lucky wheel, and shake the machine until all the coins drop.

name: Rain and Respite
summary: "Rain and Respite" is a relatively short visual novel where you talk to cute and weird girls at a tavern.

name: Rabbit Run Carrot Hunt
summary: Rabbit Run Carrot Hunt is a fast-paced endless runner where you play as a quick and clever rabbit trying to collect as many carrots as possible. Carrots restore your energy, which slowly depletes as you run. The longer you survive, the more points you earn. A black panther is chasing you and occasionally launches sudden attacks that you must jump over to avoid. At the same time, you need to dodge various obstacles along the way. Stay alert, keep collecting carrots, and run as far as you can before the panther catches you.

name: Ravenous
summary: RAVENOUS is a first-person psychological horror game combining exploration, puzzle-solving, and tense atmospheres. Navigate unique rooms in a Victorian basement, uncover clues, and solve challenges to survive. The game focuses on narrative-driven horror, immersing players in a story of family, confinement, and mystery.

name: Raybounder
summary: A unique top-down puzzle shooter where you control a robot with an unusual weapon. Throw your laser gun across gaps, hit switches, and fire the gun to shoot beams that ricochet off walls, destroy enemies, and hit targets. Make every shot count as you solve puzzles in 60+ stages!

name: Ratcheteer DX
summary: Explore the interconnected caverns below the frozen surface and a vast Snowcean above as you set out to rescue friend, foe, and stranger alike in this lo-fi action-adventure!

name: Ratstronaut
summary: Escape the sewer. Become the true ratstronaut.

name: Rabbit Rush
summary: Rabbit Rush is a fast-paced, intense action game where players control an agile, highly skilled rabbit who must complete each level in just 10 seconds. Grab your katana and sharp carrot and eliminate all enemies.

name: Ragdore
summary: RAGDORE is a physics-driven sandbox where limbs fly, bones snap, and movement changes with every injury. Experiment with traps, crushers, trampolines, and more in colorful maps designed for creative destruction and dynamic ragdoll mayhem.

name: RatScum
summary: Fallen into the sewer, a lone rat embarks on the long journey of returning home in an estranged, crumbling apartment. Navigate forgotten corners and unfamiliar spaces, befriend unlikely allies, and slip through dangers and shadows in the cracks of a broken world.

name: Ragnarok: The New World
summary:
Ragnarok: The New World is a massive online role-playing adventure set in the legendary world of Midgard. Explore vast fields, bustling cities, and mysterious dungeons where every journey holds new challenges and stories.

Create your own character and choose from classic jobs such as Swordsman, Mage, Archer, and Merchant. Customize your appearance with a wide variety of outfits, raise pets, ride mounts, and truly express yourself in a vibrant open world.

Beyond combat, build and decorate your own home—design a personal sanctuary to relax, gather with friends, and show off your creativity.

Join forces with allies to defeat powerful bosses, tackle dangerous raids, and grow together in guilds and communities. Or simply wander freely, trade, and enjoy the world at your own pace. With nostalgia and freedom at its core, Ragnarok: The New World invites you to relive the spirit of Ragnarok while writing your own legend in an ever-evolving online world.

name: Raze Vol. 1
summary: Raze Vol. 1 is a satirical punk rock VR puzzle-platformer. Team up with Raze, a punk guitarist zapped into an influencer-run nightmare. Use her power arm, dive into her mind, and spot hidden clues with her damaged eye. Voiced by Lzzy Hale. Story + Arcade modes. Raze is gonna blaze!

name: Rare Collection 1
summary: Rare is one of the best-known names in British game development, and in this collection for Evercade you’ll explore 12 all-time favourites. Includes the home computer classics Jetpac, Atic Atac, Knight Lore and more. Plus, race on land and sea with the 8-bit console hits R.C. Pro-Am and Cobra Triangle, rescue a ruined birthday in Conker’s Pocket Tales, and kick the Dark Queen’s butt in the 8-bit console and arcade versions of Battletoads!

name: Radiant Starlets
summary: Radiant Starlets is a HD2D action platformer in the vein of classic action platformers but you can date all the bosses. Select your boss order and make your way through 8 challenging stages. Try every order and uncover the mysteries of this world.

name: Rabbat
summary: RABBAT is a physics-based, 2.5D platformer. Play as a small robot, using a jetpack and defeating enemies. Collect scrap to customize the robot's parts, listen to radio songs while you explore the diverse environments, meet other robots, defeat enemies, bosses, and two extra minigames to enjoy!

name: Rabidja's Revenge
summary: In this retro inspired platformer, you play as Rabidja, the famous rabbit ninja. Travel through 20 levels including forests, seashores, underwater depths, gloomy caves, fly in the sky and explores the dark castle of the sinister Professor to get back your 12 golden pieces.

name: Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator
summary: Begin your park ranger journey in Ranger’s Path: National Park Simulator. Maintain trails, assist visitors, check permits and respond to emergencies. Explore diverse biomes and observe varied animal behaviors across a wide range of species.

name: Ramune's Square Dungeon
summary: A cute and sexy mini Metroidvania.

name: Rattenwalzer: Pesnya o bor'be i zhizni chelovecheskoy
summary: The visual novel Rattenwalzer is a story about the human willpower that regardless of sufferings and terrors lasting thousands of years has kept its beautiful nature.

name: RaceXXL Space
summary:
This game is a racing game that passes in space. Includes 14 challenging space paths and a great race with classic cars ..

Get ready to race in space with 14 classic cars !.

Collect points using the car that is open for you. Buy Level and Buggies with these scores.

Avoid missiles and obstacles in the Arena with your real opponents.
Get the highest prize money in case you win.

name: Rainbow Crown
summary: Rainbow Crown is a classic RPG adventure game. Fight powerful enemies in the game world. Grow stronger step by step by levelling up, getting equipment, and more, and finally reclaim the Colorful Crown!

name: Ratatata
summary: Ratatata is an isometric Tower Defense game where you lead a space rat kingdom fending off a ruthless cat invasion! Fight across diverse environments and adapt your strategies to survive the relentless waves of these fierce felines!

name: Radix Tale
summary: Radix Tale is a free-to-play, old-school Medieval Fantasy MMORPG with original features and entirely in Portuguese.

name: Ranger Quest: The Adventure Begins
summary: The adventure begins by navigating your way through the Sanctuary of the Orbs. A mysterious quest, the elemental orbs lying in wait for the ranger to claim and an ancient map to be remade. The Sanctuary of the Orbs is no ordinary building as the corridors twist and turn like a maze.

name: Rage Quit
summary: Rage Quit is a first-person melee game where the player uses only the sledgehammer for combat, traversal, and defense against hordes of office-bots. Use a fluid variety of light, heavy, dash-based, and reflective attacks to smash your way through your foes and enact revenge!

name: Ravenlok: Legendary Edition
summary: Embark on an enchanting journey in Ravenlok, an action-packed fairytale adventure about a young heroine destined to fulfill a perilous prophecy.

name: Railroad Manager
summary: Build tracks, drive trains, transport passengers and goods! Relaxed railway construction in retro style with a large campaign and countless missions and maps.

name: Rainbow Legends
summary: A territory-control roguelike deck builder where the side with more tiles at round’s end deals damage. Seize ground, place structures, shield your core, and unlock builds with card shapes, factions, and relics

name: Raybeem
summary: Live in your music with Raybeem. Load in your favorite tunes and watch them shape the world around you in Virtual Reality. Find your vibe by selecting a theme that fits the pace of your mood and music. If only every reality was as sublime as Raybeem.

name: Raw Concrete
summary:
"It's just a simple job. I go, take out the creature, and make a ton of money.

That guy runs an offshore oil rig, obviously loaded, and I need that cash."

name: Racing: Storm Chase
summary: This is a car racing as the core of the game, driving different cars, experience unlimited driving fun. Challenge the thrilling track, but also with friends to play two, experience the thrilling chase game!

name: Rainbound
summary: Follow Puddles, a brave little swallow, in this atmospheric 2D platformer. In a world soon perished by extreme weather conditions you'll have to avoid dangerous obstacles and navigate the terrain in your search of a safe haven.

name: Rave Heart+
summary: Experience the definitive edition of this classic RPG—now available on the Epic Games Store. Rediscover the adventure, enhanced and reimagined, and relive the thrilling story on a whole new platform!

name: Rays
summary: RAYS - the plot unveils complex emotions and psychological conflicts, forcing you to make choices that will determine the fate of the main character and the surrounding world.

name: Rabolut: Escape From Hell
summary: A 2D pixel art game where you escape crises born in a toxic workplace. With semi-randomized maps and an increasing variety of traps as you progress, players must master movement techniques and carefully plan the use of limited resources to survive. Perfect for fans of Celeste and Getting Over It.

name: Ragdoll Playground
summary: Ragdoll is a fun sandbox game with realistic collision physics. Launch your character as you would anywhere.

name: Racing Tanks!
summary: Challenge your friends in a short yet intense race!

name: Rawmen: Sakura Gusoku Cosmetic Set
summary: It's time to bloom and boom! Dip in to RAWMEN and claim your FREE Legendary Sakura Gusoku Cosmetic Set to be the kawaii-est samurai-est soupslinger in the food fight.

name: Ramona
summary: Ramona is a first-person psychological horror set in the 1970s. Use a camera to reveal the invisible, follow Ramona’s rules, and explore rooms filled with puzzles and disturbing memories in a house haunted by secrets and remorse.

name: Ramona: Play With Me
summary: Demo-prequel of Ramona – Play With Me: a 1970s psychological horror. Experience a self-contained story, discover key mechanics and feel the tension—without any spoilers for the full game.

name: Rayman 3 Havoc Reignited
summary: Rayman 3 Havoc Reignited is a non-commercial fan reimagining of Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc.

name: Ram Simulator
summary: Assemble your flock and prepare for fleece-lined fury in Ram Simulator! This all-new, totally realistic (sort of) sandbox experience puts you in control of the most stubborn, headstrong farmyard animal around - the RAM!

name: Rain World: Slugcat's Lifecycle Edition
summary: The story of the slugcats, packaged together in this Complete bundle of the base game of Rain World and its two expansions, Rain World: Downpour and Rain World: The Watcher!

name: Rax Genesis
summary: A visual album where sound shapes reality. Twenty-four movements paint abstract landscapes for you to wander, whether by foot or drifting on clouds. Your path, your pace, your interpretation.

name: Raid in Galaxy
summary: Your battleship has been attacked by unknown forces. Take control of your spacecraft, shoot them down, and embark on a journey of vengeance!From the invaded battleship, through asteroid fields, and into enemy bases, you will face a series of battles on your journey for vengeance.

name: Raven Tea
summary: Raven Tear is a stylized co-op adventure (4 players) in a small open world with horror elements. Evil has gripped the small town of "Raven Tear", you - brave hunters, must take your faithful dog and your excellent car, turn up the radio to go on a journey through the locations and drive them all back to the underworld. Grow vegetables, catch fish, earn money for equipment and arrange a safari for monsters!

name: RadioWave: Black Signal
summary: This isn't the RadioWave you remember... discover the lore and even more origins behind the story of RadioWave in this thrilling prequel chapter and find out how Tim Spencer started his rampage.

name: Raidbound
summary: Raidbound is a Viking-themed auto-battler with a worker placement style system. Recruit warriors, forge gear, sacrifice for power, and raid rival clans. Choose your path, build your warband, and earn glory across a mythic map of tactical choices.

name: Ravenwood 46
summary: A 2D psychological point-and-click horror game where you explore disturbing environments and uncover hidden truths through narrative-driven gameplay.

name: Raccoon Valley Tycoon
summary: Raccoon Valley Tycoon is a cozy clicker tycoon game about rebuilding your village with help from a mysterious new friend. The King is missing, and it’s up to you to restore what was lost. Click, collect, upgrade, and delegate your hard work to cute raccoons.

name: Radiant Click
summary: Defeat waves of enemies to grow stronger in this arena shooter. Overcome each boss granting you more upgrade paths to make your character your own. Multiple classes to choose from, plenty of upgrade paths and many hordes to cut through.

name: Ravy Davy: Attack on Ambiguity
summary: Play as a washed-up rockstar Ravy Davy battling aliens, biker gangs, satanic cults and whackjobs in the desert town of Ambiguity—ruled by villain Margaret Doom, a chain-smoking OAP on a mobility scooter.

name: RaceWorms
summary: Dig your way through this competitive multiplayer racing game with up to 6 players! RaceWorms can be played online, locally (max. 4 players) or both. Burrow through dynamic maps, leap from the ground to gain a burst of speed, and use items to hinder your opponents.

name: Racer Overdrive
summary: This game tells the story of your rise from obscure rookie to racing star. A global championship, hosted by a mysterious tech company, is your chance to establish yourself in the world of racing. Experience extreme drifting and nitro acceleration on iconic tracks around the world. Experience a refreshing driving system, multi-mode racing, and a rich main and side storyline. As the race progresses, participate in various events and become famous. Ultimately, uncover the championship's conspiracy from the mysterious host company and face off against an out-of-control super artificial intelligence!

name: Rabbit's Hop
summary: Guide clever rabbits into one hole using smart hops and limited moves. Plan each jump carefully — squirrels, logs, and lily pads add fun twists! Use obstacles wisely to solve unique puzzles that blend logic, timing, and strategy.

name: Rage Fishing
summary: Help Mr. Wormy rescue his beloved by tackling fast-paced and absurd microgames in this chaotic, frenetic and addictive arcade fishing game.

name: Raised From Hell
summary: Raised from Hell is a first-person psychological horror game! Explore the mysteries of your grandfather's mansion by searching for clues, solving puzzles, and noticing strange occurrences… An adventure awaits you, and maybe someone has been raised from hell…

name: Rare Rabbits: Snuggle Haven
summary:
Rare Rabbits is an adorable, turn-based simulation game where you can already breed more than 6,000,000 unique rabbits and manage your very own rabbit farm.
Each rabbit’s appearance and traits are determined by scientifically accurate genetics and inheritance principles, down to the smallest allele!

name: Ramshackle
summary: Ramshackle is a multiplayer sandbox game where you design a combat vehicle, or "Vessel", out of destructible parts and armor, and put it to the test against other player-driven and AI Vessels. Share designs with other players on your server or license it out to the AI and encounter it in battle!

name: RabbitHole Island: Turn-based Vtuber Battles
summary: Turn-based battles against powerful vtubers. Free to Play!

name: Rabbit Samurai
summary: In Rabbit Samurai, you’ll join a colorful 2D deck-building adventure. Each fight is tougher and funnier than the last.

name: Rampage
summary: Want to be the first to experience all the new features and help us make the server perfect? We will be happy to invite the most interested players to test the new game build from our team.

name: Ragdoll Arena: Kick the body
summary: Kick, crash, survive - the arena never forgives!

name: Racoon Escape 2: Warehouse Storage
summary: A Chubby Raccoon named Popo is trapped in a warehouse storage. Help Popo escape from the warehouse.

name: Rat Race
summary: A satirical puzzle-strategy game where you command a team of office drones through absurd corporate obstacle courses while enduring constant “motivation” from your overbearing CEO.

name: Radica Bass Fishin'
summary: This was a partially motion controlled simulation handheld game where you play as a fisherman going fishing.

name: Ratshot
summary: RATSHOT is a slick, fast paced platformer where you use the recoil of your gun to launch yourself through levels. Race through grimy streets and sewers while trying to get the best times and ranks, or play at your own pace and admire the graffiti-covered walls of NYC.

name: Ravenmoore Psychiatric Hospital
summary: Explore an oppressive and terrifying environment where you play as a young man who infiltrates the old and abandoned Ravenmoore Psychiatric Hospital in search of the harsh reality hidden behind this place. Every sound can be a sign of danger... Don't let them find you, and especially not HER......

name: Radio Zed
summary: You and your friends are stuck in a small town and your supplies running out. The radio transmitter on the roof of your building is your only hope for salvation, but it is still silent. The zombies outside seem to be attracted to the signal... use all your firepower to stop them!

name: Ravenous
summary: Ravenous, a new spinning action game, is now available! Spin your hideout, destroy your enemies, and capture your captive allies!

name: Rat Run
summary: Jump your way through endless obstacles and smash incoming enemies as a cheese-thirsty rat! Accelerate to the maximum speed and unlock all biomes and playable rodents!

name: Rapid Eye Madness
summary: Rapid Eye Madness is a short grim & cute collection of mini-games that are as cryptic as they are engaging. Venture into the eldritch nightmare, and stream for your life as you solve the challenges the screens throw at you. Will you survive this eerie gamescape, or become another one of its victims?

name: Ratchet & Clank: Ranger Rumble
summary:
The iconic characters from the Ratchet & Clank franchise are back in a stunning, fast-paced arena shooter packed with explosive weapons and larger-than-life action!
Experience the humor, action, and energy of the iconic universe in a bold new real-time multiplayer format. Play as a Legendary Hero from the past, now with unique abilities. Go solo or team up with other Rangers online in thrilling multiplayer games built for every kind of player. Free to download soon!

name: Ramen-ten: Heart Abyss
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a cozy Asian noodle shop right from your desk. Discover new recipes, decorate your counter, and treat peasants, samurai, and yokai to delicious, hot food while you work or relax.

name: RandomRoll Challenge
summary:
The game is about getting and beating highscores for different Levels.
Your goal is to collect enough random dice rolls to upgrade the speed for the next diceroll.
So try out your luck and get the best possible highscore, but be careful not to get angry if you dont get the needed roll. ;)

name: Raji: Kaliyuga
summary: Six years after the great war, destiny bleeds into prophecy as gods and mortals blur. Raji, the warrior of faith, and Darsh, the dreamwalker, face Mahabalasuras wrath as he tears open heavens gates, unleashing Kaliyuga-an age where every choice can unmake the universe.

name: Raveren: The Legend Of Etheria
summary:
Raveren: The Legend of Etheria

A dark fantasy RPG where memory is your greatest weapon—and your deepest curse.

name: Randel's Quest
summary: Guide Randel and a tongue-tied thesaurus on an epic quest in a slot-driven, Wordle-style roguelike battler. Roll the slots for effects, read the color hints and strike with the right word at the right moment! Every word counts. Even the wrong ones!

name: Razorlocks
summary: Blaze the trails, race your heart out, and let your bladed hair down to explore. Razorlocks is on a journey of speeding to the top and realizing her potential with strands of both style and substance.

name: Raptor Evolution
summary: Smash through environments, gather resources, and hunt grotesque human-mutants to evolve and grow stronger. Use what you collect to rebuild bridges, restore paths and push deeper into a world filled with danger and mystery.

name: Raptor Evolution: Celestosaurus
summary: Radiate strength and grace with the Celestosaurus skin - a majestic raptor glowing with cosmic energy.

name: Raptor Evolution: Vectoraptor
summary: Transform your raptor into a futuristic predator with the Vectoraptor skin - a neon-coated beast powered by pure energy and precision.

name: Raptor Evolution: Infermadon
summary: Set the world ablaze with the Infermadon skin - a raging raptor born from fire.

name: Racing Simulator Bundle: Driving School Simulator & Real Driving Simulator
summary: Learn. Race. Win.

name: Racing Game Bundle
summary: Four unique racing worlds — one ultimate speed experience.

name: Raahi
summary: In Raahi you play as Sandy, an auto rickshaw driver exploring 1990s Goa. Drive freely, meet passengers, and enjoy their small stories. Wander through beaches and markets with a day and night cycle, and take part in mini games like the friendly street race and traditional Goan fenny making

name: Rage Bait
summary: Mechanics, you can play first person or 3rd person. puzzle simulator with funny dialouge. It's a walking simulator with narrative choices for different outcomes and is a meta comedy like Stanley parable.

name: Railroad to Hell 3
summary: Defend your cursed train on its last ride through a haunted wasteland — once alive, now swarming with monsters hungry for your soul. You’ve got 3 weapons, 50 waves, and one last ticket… straight to Hell

name: Railroad to Amberfield
summary: Build railway routes across a cozy tile-based map. Guide your train toward Amberfield while completing a variety of tasks along the way. Enjoy the freedom to shape your own journey and reach the destination within a limited number of turns.

name: Rail Rescue
summary: Draw tracks, dodge crashes, and rescue lost buddies in Rail Rescue: Puzzle Lines—a colorful brain‑teasing railroad builder with 100+ handcrafted levels. Play now for free!

name: Rainforest Solitaire
summary: Enjoy the addictive beautiful matching solitaire in the tropical forest and show your card skills!

name: Ramadan Challenges
summary: Test your skills, learn Ramadan facts, and complete fun daily challenges in the spirit of the holy month!

name: Ratocalypse
summary: A strategy RPG where you design the AI of your characters! The prince of a fallen kingdom, ruined by a zombie plague, investigates the capital overrun with the undead in search of hope to resolve the crisis.

name: Ratsukade
summary: Drag heavy gems, slay giant bugs, find mystical items and craft overpowered builds in this action packed physics based roguelike!

name: Ratmouse
summary: it's rat vs roach in this arcade style romp... RATMOUSE is a fast-paced, challenging, arcade style romp where you play as a RAT, with your MOUSE (get it yet?)

name: Rainbows Are Carnivores
summary: Rainbows Are Carnivores is a short gay fishing / aquaculture romance game in your web browser.

name: Ratocalypse
summary: A classic "Boomer Shooter" trying to capture that feeling of pure, fast-paced retro action

name: RadCity: a post-apocalyptic adventure
summary: Scavenge for food and escape a dead city in a broken, post apocalyptic world. Gather enough food for 40 days and prepare for a train journey to a place of refuge. Featuring a top-down perspective and a finely crafted 3D world.

name: Radiant Sky
summary: You and a group of adventurers must travel the world and unite the factions of weather spirits to stop constant natural disasters and stop an inevitable world ending catastrophe once the sky turns "radiant".

name: Ratdoodle Adventure
summary: Explore an adorable Claymation inspired world as Doodle the Rat in this whimsical 3D Platforming Adventure!

name: Rated.
summary:
In the near future, society has reduced human worth to a simple rating system. Every smile, every gesture, every outfit is judged—and every star determines your place in the world.

You are Echo, an ordinary person living under the constant gaze of others. From the moment you wake up to the time you return home, your choices are weighed: be authentic and risk rejection, or perform for approval and climb the star ladder.

Through short chapters in a single day, you’ll experience life in a world where connection has been replaced with evaluation. With no dialogue—only actions and ratings—Rated tells a story of identity, conformity, and the quiet cost of chasing perfection.

Will you stay true to yourself, or become the flawless mask they want to see?

name: Ravenswatch: Merlin
summary: The greatest wizard in Avalon awakens from his prison of slumber, stripped of his clairvoyance but not his power. With nature, arcane and sacred magic, Merlin the sorcerer has an extraordinary arsenal. Unlock a new playable hero with this DLC.

name: Radiant Sword
summary: The golden age of the strategy RPG returns. An emotional, intricate tale rendered in gorgeous mixed 2D/3D. Customize your soldiers by mastering the three-tier Cross Paradigm class system and guide your army to victory.

name: Rat Lines
summary: In an alternate 1945, the Axis powers never fell. Explore ruined cities and secret facilities, uncover what’s left of humanity, and strike back against those who rewrote history. Will you survive long enough to tell the truth?

name: Rain Dogs
summary: RAIN DOGS is a single-player, narrative experience set in a reflection of the urban sprawl you used to call home. Explore and interact with other prisoners of this throw-away society to learn more about why you were put here and what your path forward will be.

name: RageByte
summary: A minimalist precision platformer designed to lie to you. Dodge spikes, survive portal shifts, and trust nothing.

name: Radio Farm
summary: relax and take an afternoon stroll in gravel county.

name: RAM Downloader
summary: Do you need more RAM? Of course you do. Everybody does. Get RAM Downloader and improve your quality of life. It's easy. You click Download. RAM increases. You live a happier life.

name: Rasen
summary: Strike with precision, time your deflects and fight flawlessly to your own rhythm. Step into atmospheric PvP or PvE arena duels and fast-paced clashes with a variety of lethal characters.

name: Rakshasa
summary: Rakshasa is a first-person, narrative-driven RPG set in modern India, where a hidden world of Tantrik spellcasters and ancient mythological horrors operate on the margins of society. Rakshasa blends brutal turn-based combat with deep roleplaying full of meaningful player choices.

name: Rance IX
summary: The oldest nation to still exist on the Continent is the militant Helmanian Empire. A country with a long history, and once the most powerful nation in the world, Helman has experienced years of decay under a corrupt regime.

name: Rance 03
summary: As the kingdom falls, Princess Lia sends her most trusted servant to find the only man who can save her kingdom... the lucky adventurer Rance! Will Rance succeed in retaking the Kingdom of Leazas?

name: Rance Quest Magnum
summary: Rance sets off on another grand (though not always grave) adventure across the Continent to find a cure for the curse and get his life back in order!

name: Raiding Party
summary: Raiding Party is a roguelite action rpg with horror gameplay elements. You play as the Wastelander, a retired agent who is ordered to retrieve an ancient AI device. Recruit, train, and lead a raiding party of elite warriors against an evil empire as you discover the AI can help save humanity.

name: Raze
summary: You are one of the Keepers of the Shadow World. The entire dead side calls upon you to prevent the apocalypse and stop the fulfillment of an ancient prophecy, for everything is beginning to spiral out of control.

name: Ranchbound
summary: Ranchbound is a western-themed real-time strategy and management game focused on running and expanding a ranch. Players manage cowboys and livestock, assign workers to tasks, transport cattle between locations, and make economic decisions to keep the ranch profitable and alive. The game combines strategic planning, light survival elements, and a stylized depiction of life in the Wild West.

name: Ravelle: Last Draw
summary: What starts as casual matches in a humble café becomes a shared effort to protect a place that matters. Ravelle is a free-to-play turn-based strategy card game with visual novel elements, blending tactical card battles and personal character stories.

name: Rail Estate
summary: Outbid your rivals in auctions for key railway routes, then build and upgrade tracks to dominate the rail economy. Players compete to create the most profitable network, balancing speed, capacity, and maintenance in a dynamic simulation
